name: Small Barrel
description: A small, empty barrel.

name: Ivy
description: A lightweight and extremely strong plant. Used to make nets for pitfall traps.

name: Gunpowder
description: A dangerous substance that explodes when struck or heated.

name: Large Barrel
description: A large, empty barrel. Combine with gunpowder to make it into a bomb.

name: Net
description: A hardy net that can support weight without breaking. Perfect for pitfall traps.

name: Spider Web
description: A very sticky web. Used to craft pitfall traps.

name: Powercharm
description: An amulet that strengthens attacks. Just carrying this gives you demonic strength.

name: Trap Tool
description: A must-have item for putting together pitfall traps and other kinds of traps.

name: Powertalon
description: A charm that strengthens attacks. Its effects are boosted by the claws within.

name: Catalyst
description: Works with other materials to enhance their effects. Cannot be used by itself.

name: Armortalon
description: A charm that strengthens defense. Its effects are boosted by the claws within.

name: Armorcharm
description: An amulet that increases defense. Just carrying this makes your skin stone hard.

name: Honey
description: Highly nutritious honey. Combine with potions to make the more potent mega potion.

name: Fire Herb
description: A wondrous, flammable plant. Useful for crafting explosives and Flaming Ammo.

name: Herb
description: A primary ingredient in potions.

name: Antidote Herb
description: A primary ingredient in antidotes.

name: Flowfern
description: This plant's leaves store ample water. A component for making Water Ammo.

name: Snow Herb
description: A plant that radiates ice- cold air. Combine with other items to create Freeze Ammo.

name: Sleep Herb
description: A plant containing sleeping agents. Used to craft tranquilizers.

name: Sunscorned Grass
description: A strange and fragrant herb that grows in the shade. Used to make deodorant.

name: Gloamgrass Bud
description: An herb that wilts under the sun's rays. Could it hold healing powers?

name: Felvine
description: A Melynx's favorite food— they just have to steal it.

name: Blue Mushroom
description: A mushroom infused with power-enhancing effects. Used in restorative items.

name: Mandragora
description: A dangerous fungus said to draw the life out of people. Required to make max potions.

name: Nitroshroom
description: A hard-to-find mushroom that can generate blazing heat. Required to craft gunpowder.

name: Parashroom
description: A mushroom that induces paralysis. Required to craft tranq bombs.

name: Toadstool
description: A mushroom that induces poison. Required to craft poison smoke bombs.

name: Bitterbug
description: A bug with innate healing abilities. Used as a component of many medicines.

name: Exciteshroom
description: Has a very strange aroma. Is it edible? Is it deadly? Required to make farcasters.

name: Godbug
description: An insect said to live a millennium. Combine it with other items to add their properties to the powder.

name: Thunderbug
description: An insect that sparks when hit. Required to make Shock Traps and Thunder Ammo.

name: Scatterfish
description: A shrapnel-spewing fish. Mix with a large barrel bomb for a dramatic firepower boost.

name: Flashbug
description: An insect that emits a blinding flash when it dies. Required to make Flash Bombs.

name: Popfish
description: A fish that literally pops when it dies. Required to craft cleanser.

name: Dung
description: Exactly as stated. Exudes a pungent smell. Used to make dung bombs.

name: Latchberry
description: A nut that bears a spiral groove. Used to make Pierce Ammo.

name: Smokenut
description: A nut that produces torrents of smoke. Combine with other items to add more effects.

name: Needleberry
description: A nut covered in needle-like spines. Used to make Spread Ammo.

name: Huskberry
description: A nut with a rock-hard shell. Used to make Shrapnel Ammo.

name: Blastnut
description: A nut used to make Sticky Ammo.

name: Bomberry
description: A nut that ruptures on impact. Used to make cluster bombs.

name: Dragonfell Berry
description: A mysterious berry, thought to be loathed by dragons. Needed to make Dragon Ammo.

name: Slashberry
description: Used to make Slicing Ammo.

name: Dragonstrike Nut
description: A nut that explodes on impact. Used to make Wyvern Ammo.

name: Gunpowder Lv2
description: Combustible powder. Combine with level 1 ammo to raise its level.

name: Flamenut
description: Used to make gunpowder that increases ammo firepower.

name: Combustuna
description: A fish that ignites upon death. Mix with fire herbs to make gunpowder.

name: Big Combustuna
description: A jumbo-sized Combustuna. Mix with fire herbs to get lots of gunpowder.

name: Gunpowder Lv3
description: Highly combustible powder. Combine with level 1 ammo to raise its level.

name: Great Flamefin
description: A jumbo-sized Flamefin. Mix with fire herbs to make lots of quality gunpowder.

name: Blazenut
description: Used to make gunpowder that greatly increases ammo firepower.

name: Flamefin
description: A fish that ignites upon death. Mix with fire herbs to make quality gunpowder.

name: Empty Phial
description: A regular old empty phial. Nothing more, nothing less.

name: Gray Seed
description: Seeds from a monster, soaked in explosive oil. Too dangerous to keep after a quest.

name: Crimson Seed
description: Seeds from a monster, soaked in explosive oil. Too dangerous to keep after a quest.

name: Gold Seed
description: Seeds from a monster, buzzing with electricity. Too dangerous to keep after a quest.

name: Blue Seed
description: Seeds from a monster, soaked with water. Too dangerous to keep after a quest.

name: Silver Seed
description: Seeds from a monster, chilled with cold air. Too dangerous to keep after a quest.

name: Mountshrooms
description: A heaping mushroom platter. Made with shrooms of all types and sizes.

name: Shadeshrooms
description: A random assortment of mushrooms—some deadly, some valuable.

name: Stargazer Flower
description: A plant that looks to the heavens when it blooms. Its petals are used to make dye.

name: Stargazer Bloom
description: A stargazer flower in full bloom. Its dignified display outshines the starry sky.

name: Sinister Cloth
description: Found long ago in the tomb of a king from a long- forgotten desert land.

name: Sinister Darkcloth
description: A burial cloth said to have shrouded an ancient desert king. Believed to be cursed.

name: Bumblepumpkin
description: A trendy orange pumpkin. If left undisturbed, it can grow to be gigantic.

name: Omegapumpkin
description: Bumblepumpkins that grow to be this gigantic are referred to as "Omegakins."

name: Cutejelly
description: A jellyfish with a uniquely cute pattern. Looks fluffy, but don't touch it.

name: Gothjelly
description: A gothic-looking jellyfish with the same unique pattern, but more frills.

name: Dreamshell
description: A shell that contains a sedating gas. It's adorned with other shells and rocks.

name: Toxic Kumori
description: An insect that possesses a powerful poison used by certain tribes for hunting.

name: Butterfly Beetle
description: An odd insect with the huge jaws of a beetle and the dainty wings of a butterfly.

name: Blossom Cricket
description: A beautiful bell cricket resembling a flower. A chirp opens the hardest of hearts.

name: Dosbiscus
description: A large, beautifully colored flowering plant foreign to this land.

name: Armored Bream
description: A fish with massive scales, which have a wyvern-like quality to them.

name: Springnight Carp
description: A species of carp whose arrival signals the start of the breeding season.

name: Speartuna
description: A giant fish that's both rare and valuable. It looks like it could have some use.

name: Barrel Lid
description: A small barrel lid. There appears to be a drawing on it.

name: Iron Ore
description: Ore that can be smelted into metal and used for many different purposes.

name: Earth Crystal
description: Crystallized microbes which are prized as an abrasive when forging weapons.

name: Machalite Ore
description: An ore that yields better metals than iron ore. Used to make machalite.

name: Dragonite Ore
description: An ore that yields metal superior to that of machalite—rare and valuable.

name: Icium
description: Precious metal from the Frost Islands. Shines bright white when the light catches it.

name: Gracium
description: Precious metal from the Frost Islands. Shines bright white when the light catches it.

name: Lightcrystal
description: Many scour the Flooded Forest for this faintly-glowing, adamantine substance.

name: Firestone
description: Combusts even at room temperature. Its heat can be used to fuse materials.

name: Novacrystal
description: A shining crystal found in places like the Flooded Forest. Only used in the finest crafts.

name: Firecell Stone
description: A magma-like deposit that only trained hands can properly work with.

name: Armor Sphere
description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it by a tiny amount.

name: Carbalite Ore
description: An ore still being studied. It yields even better metal than dragonite.

name: Armor Sphere+
description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it by a small amount.

name: Fucium Ore
description: Ore composed of a mysterious metal; can fuse nearly any two materials together.

name: Advanced Armor Sphere
description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it.

name: Hard Armor Sphere
description: A rigid, high-density armor sphere used to solidly help improve armor.

name: Aquaglow Jewel
description: An indispensable item used in decorations.

name: Heavy Armor Sphere
description: A heavy, high-density armor sphere used to greatly help improve armor.

name: Bloodrun Jewel
description: An indispensable item used in decorations. A shame that these are so high-end.

name: Twisted Remains
description: A crazily contorted bone. Gives off the eerie vibes of the Shrine Ruins.

name: Twisted Rockbone
description: A crazily contorted bone. Echoes the silent but creepy aura of the Shrine Ruins.

name: Lazurite Jewel
description: An indispensable item used in decorations. This one doesn't come along often.

name: Eroded Skeleton
description: A skeleton buried in the Sandy Plains. Shaped by years of wind erosion.

name: Eroded Husk
description: Buffeted by hot sands and cold nights, only the sturdiest bones remain.

name: Quality Bone
description: Quality bone material. Its toughness and pliability lend well to crafting.

name: Sturdy Bone
description: A rigid bone taken from a bonepile. Durable but light and easy to handle.

name: Dragonhusk Shard
description: A bone fragment from a long- dead dragon. It still emits a majestic air.

name: Dragonbone Relic
description: A curiously unfossilized bone from a dragon that once roamed these lands.

name: Monster Bone S
description: A very useful material; indispensable for both hunting and daily life.

name: Monster Bone M
description: A nicely-sized bone. Strong yet flexible, it's as reliable as steel and wood.

name: Monster Bone L
description: Bone from a large monster. Its size is hard to work with but vital to craft big items.

name: Monster Bone+
description: A high-quality monster bone. Hard to obtain, but vital to craft powerful equipment.

name: Monster Keenbone
description: A rare bone with a razor- sharp tip that retains its strength even when crafted.

name: Elder Dragon Bone
description: A bone from an elder dragon. It exudes majesty.

name: Monster Hardbone
description: A precious bone rarely yielded by wyverns. Hard to forge but incredibly strong.

name: Jumbo Bone
description: A large, thick bone. Often cut apart in workshops for use in crafting.

name: Stoutbone
description: The large, sturdy bone of a beast. Prized by blacksmiths as a prime forging material.

name: Great Stoutbone
description: Large bone that is both strong and durable. A top- tier bone material.

name: Colossal Bone
description: Massive bone from a large beast. It's really, really big. Versatile material.

name: Sharp Claw
description: A shining black claw. Unlike wyvern claws, this is shaped to grip objects.

name: Piercing Claw
description: Dangerous to touch with bare hands, it's used as a knife in some workshops.

name: Sharp Fang
description: Fangs come in many shapes and sizes—the right fang for the right job.

name: Acute Fang
description: Fangs come in many shapes and sizes. This one is small but can still pierce scale.

name: Warm Pelt
description: A pelt from a small animal. Used for many things, but mostly just regular clothes.

name: High-quality Pelt
description: Feels wonderful to the touch. Difficult to carve but valued by the Guild.

name: Pale Extract
description: Has the ability to amplify the effects of certain medicines.

name: Dash Extract
description: A mysterious substance culled from certain monsters that increases endurance.

name: Monster Fluid
description: A liquid bugs suck from monsters. Mixes with insect fluids to form an adhesive.

name: Monster Broth
description: A broth made from only the thickest of a monster's juices. Quite rich.

name: Elder Dragon Blood
description: Contains an unknown compound. The object of much scholarly research.

name: Bird Wyvern Gem
description: A valuable gem that can be harvested from bird wyverns. Said to fetch a high price on the market.

name: Beast Gem
description: A valuable jewel formed from coagulated juices inside a monster. Glows wildly.

name: Wyvern Gem
description: Throughout a wyvern's life, impurities gather and form this peculiar gem.

name: Screamer Sac
description: A monster organ that emits an earsplitting sonic blast when ruptured.

name: Poison Sac
description: A monster organ that contains a lethal toxin. Handle with extreme care.

name: Toxin Sac
description: A monster organ filled with an extremely potent toxin. Even one touch can be risky.

name: Paralysis Sac
description: A monster organ that contains paralyzing neurotoxins.

name: Omniplegia Sac
description: A monster organ filled with potent neurotoxins. A single touch can cause paralysis.

name: Sleep Sac
description: A monster organ that contains a knockout powder capable of inducing sleep.

name: Coma Sac
description: A monster organ that contains dangerous powder. One whiff can induce a coma.

name: Flame Sac
description: A monster organ filled with flammable powder. Handle with extreme care.

name: Inferno Sac
description: A monster organ filled with powder that ignites if it so much as touches air. Danger!

name: Electro Sac
description: A monster organ that can store up electricity, which is released on impact.

name: Thunder Sac
description: A monster organ that can store up large amounts of high voltage electricity.

name: Frost Sac
description: A monster internal organ, filled with extremely cold fluid. Handle with care.

name: Freezer Sac
description: A monster organ with tremendous freezing power. Freezes its surroundings.

name: Aqua Sac
description: A monster organ designed to hold and preserve water.

name: Torrent Sac
description: A monster organ designed to hold and preserve copious amounts of water.

name: Pawprint Stamp
description: Lynian currency, stamped with a pawprint. The letters written on it are foreign.

name: Felyne Fur Ruby
description: A priceless ruby formed by the rare hardening of a Felyne hairball.

name: Kelbi Horn
description: While unfit for forging, Kelbi horns are a vital component of many items.

name: Bombadgy Igniter
description: Bombadgy body fluid that is prone to bursting into flame. Emitted when in danger.

name: Gargwa Feather
description: A big, beautiful feather plucked from a Gargwa. Often used as a fashion accessory.

name: Anteka Antler
description: An antler often used as raw material for armor. Popular with interior decorators.

name: Slagtoth Hide+
description: Lustrous hide often cut into large slabs. Prized for its water-resistant properties.

name: Slagtoth Hide
description: A Slagtoth hide. It's pretty saggy, helping them evade deadly attacks.

name: Kestodon Shell
description: This Kestodon shell's craggy texture helps to fend off attackers.

name: Kestodon Carapace
description: This sturdy Kestodon shell has grown unusually thick. Feels a bit like a rock.

name: Kestodon Scalp
description: A Kestodon cranial carapace. Get slammed by this and you're in for a bad time.

name: Rhenoplos Shell
description: A shell that is very strong despite coming from such a small monster.

name: Rhenoplos Carapace
description: A carapace grown thick and hard over many years. Super strong for a small monster.

name: Rhenoplos Scalp
description: A sturdy part of the skull that yields, shall we say, dashing results?

name: Bullfango Pelt
description: A pelt from a Bullfango, covered in bristly fur.

name: Bullfango Pelt+
description: A high-quality pelt from a Bullfango. It's as tough as it is bristly.

name: Bullfango Head
description: A Bullfango head, complete with two splendid tusks.

name: Jagras Scale
description: Scale harvested from a Jagras. Famous for its vivid hue and ease of handling.

name: Jagras Scale+
description: Precious scale taken from a Jagras. Great for everything from armor to jewelry.

name: Jagras Hide
description: This Jagras skin is easy to work with, making it a great choice for novice craftsmen.

name: Jagras Hide+
description: High-quality Jagras skin. Thicker, smoother, but still just as easy to work with.

name: Sharqskin Scale
description: Zamite skin that feels smooth or coarse depending on which way you rub it.

name: Meaty Hide
description: The hide from the underbelly of a Zamite. Super elastic— just try stretching it.

name: Meaty Hide+
description: The hide from the underbelly of a Zamite. The most elastic samples are costly.

name: Quality Fin
description: A beautiful, unmarred fin. Its perfection lends it both strength and high value.

name: Big Fin
description: A fin that can be all shapes and sizes. The strongest come from the Sandy Plains Delex.

name: Hydro Hide
description: Hide that is very resistant to water. Don't expect it to sell for much.

name: Hydro Hide+
description: The durable hide of an aquatic monster. Highly Water-resistant, and in especially good shape.

name: Uroktor Scale
description: A volcanic monster's scale. Highly resistant to fire, but doesn't sell for much.

name: Immature Sponge
description: Ludroth sponge that's not fully developed. Popular for many uses besides forging.

name: Uroktor Scale+
description: A high-quality Uroktor scale. Heat-resistant, bright crimson, and popular with the ladies.

name: Rachnoid Silk
description: Silk shot by Rachnoid. Its high tensile strength makes it stronger than it looks.

name: Rachnoid Silk+
description: High quality silk that is nearly as strong as rope and more flexible too.

name: Bnahabra Shell
description: Just as useful as sturdy wyvern shell in the hands of a clever craftsman.

name: Bnahabra Carapace
description: The hardest part of the shell. Reveals curious properties when forged.

name: Bnahabra Wing
description: Difficult to forge with— the results vary depending on which surface you use.

name: Bnahabra Stinger
description: A Bnahabra stinger. It's actually a hollow tube that houses paralytic secretions.

name: Altaroth Jaw
description: Removing these mouthparts requires a deft hand.

name: Altaroth Stomach
description: A transparent sac cut from an Altaroth's abdomen, used to store who knows what.

name: Quality Stomach
description: A high-quality sac from an Altaroth's abdomen. It's thin, but durable.

name: Gajau Skin
description: Gajau skin known for its slimy mucus layer. Highly water-resistant.

name: Gajau Whisker
description: Gajau whiskers often used in aquatic gear as they resist water.

name: Gajau Scale
description: High-quality Gajau skin. Thick and hard to work with, but it's worth the effort.

name: Gajau Whisker+
description: High-quality Gajau whiskers. They're so girthy, you could use them for fishing line.

name: Remobra Hide
description: A glossy and subdued black hide taken from a Remobra.

name: Remobra Hide+
description: A lustrous and elegant black hide taken from a Remobra.

name: Striped Hide
description: Unassuming black-and-red hues from a Remobra that some hunters swear by.

name: Remobra Head
description: The snake-like head of a Remobra. It still looks ready to pounce!

name: Izuchi Pelt
description: Izuchi hair. Very versatile— you can't go five steps without seeing it somewhere.

name: Izuchi Pelt+
description: High-quality hair taken from an elite Izuchi in the pack. Pleasantly soft to touch.

name: Izuchi Tail
description: Izuchi that swing their tail skillfully may become the leader of the pack.

name: Wroggi Scale
description: A scale from a Wroggi. Its vivid color warns predators of its venomous properties.

name: Wroggi Scale+
description: A quality Wroggi scale. The thickness shows this Wroggi lived a long life.

name: Wroggi Hide
description: Hide from a Wroggi. You could make some really nice orange leather with this.

name: Baggi Scale
description: A scale from a Baggi. A little tougher than a Jaggi scale.

name: Baggi Scale+
description: A quality scale taken from a Baggi. Important for strengthening weapons.

name: Baggi Hide
description: Smooth hide from under a Baggi's scales. Perfect for life in tough environments.

name: Jaggi Scale
description: A scale carved from a Jaggi. Popular among hunters for its beauty and versatility.

name: Jaggi Scale+
description: A vividly-colored superior Jaggi scale that can be used to make hardier equipment.

name: Jaggi Hide
description: Hide from under a Jaggi's scales. Cheap, easy to work with, and has numerous uses.

name: Jaggi Hide+
description: A quality Jaggi hide with a variety of uses. Popular for its beautiful hue.

name: Great Izuchi Pelt
description: Hair that grows on an Izuchi's neck and head. Fades from white to orange.

name: Great Izuchi Pelt+
description: Great Izuchi hair. On top of being gorgeous, it's smooth as a gentle breeze.

name: Great Izuchi Hide
description: This hide of a mature Izuchi is a deep orange fitting for the leader of the herd.

name: Great Izuchi Hide+
description: Great Izuchi hide. It's lightweight, strong, and vivid—always a hot item.

name: Great Izuchi Tail
description: A crescent-bladed tail. A flick of the herd leader's tail brings its prey down.

name: Great Izuchi Tail+
description: Crescent-bladed tail. Its edge has been honed by the wind to be razor sharp.

name: Great Baggi Hide
description: Hide from a Great Baggi. Despite how tough it is, it's covered in old scars.

name: Great Baggi Hide+
description: Quality Great Baggi hide. You'd be hard pressed to hurt a Baggi this tough.

name: Great Baggi Claw
description: A robust Great Baggi claw. It's thicker than a regular old Baggi claw.

name: Great Baggi Claw+
description: A quality Great Baggi Claw. Sharpened by battle, it's perfect for weapons.

name: King's Crest
description: A token of an alpha Baggi. The bigger the crest, the stronger they are.

name: Kulu-Ya-Ku Scale
description: With some fine crafting, the milky white color of these scales can be improved.

name: Kulu-Ya-Ku Scale+
description: Boasts brilliant coloration, and leaves nothing to be desired in strength.

name: Kulu-Ya-Ku Hide+
description: Just like the sturdy Kulu hide you know, except stronger, and smoother too.

name: Kulu-Ya-Ku Hide
description: Due to its versatile coloration, this hide is often used in clothing.

name: Kulu-Ya-Ku Beak
description: This beak, developed to eat the yolks out of eggs, has a peculiar shape.

name: Kulu-Ya-Ku Beak+
description: This Kulu beak is a peck above the rest. Stronger than typical wyvern hide.

name: Kulu-Ya-Ku Plume
description: These feathers are a hit among trendy youth for their vibrant patterns.

name: Great Wroggi Hide
description: Hide from a Great Wroggi. The white-on-orange pattern almost looks dyed.

name: Kulu-Ya-Ku Plume+
description: These larger, more colorful feathers are often used in decorative items.

name: Great Wroggi Hide+
description: Quality Great Wroggi hide. The colors would look great on an expert's weapon.

name: Great Wroggi Brace
description: A brace from a Great Wroggi. Covered in scales, it also includes claws and plate.

name: Great Wroggi Brace+
description: A tough Great Wroggi brace comprised of high-quality plate and claws.

name: King's Beak
description: A beak from a Great Wroggi. Careful with it— it's still poisonous!

name: Arzuros Pelt
description: An Arzuros pelt. The white portion is soft, while the blue is short and taut.

name: Arzuros Pelt+
description: A splendid Arzuros pelt. Sturdy enough to survive in harsh mountainous terrain.

name: Arzuros Shell
description: Shell from an Arzuros's head or back. Bends willingly and is easy to forge.

name: Arzuros Carapace
description: A quality Arzuros carapace. The thick shell can endure bites from ordinary fangs.

name: Arzuros Brace
description: A brace from an Arzuros's forelegs. Its sharp points give forged equipment a wild flavor.

name: Arzuros Brace+
description: A strong Arzuros brace. Its thorn-like protrusions make paw swipes deadly.

name: Lagombi Pelt
description: A white pelt carved from a Lagombi. One pat and you'll be hooked on its fluffy fur.

name: Lagombi Pelt+
description: Quality white Lagombi pelt. Its frosty shine makes it a sought-after luxury item.

name: Lagombi Ear
description: The long ear of a Lagombi. A lifetime in the cold has made it hard as a shell.

name: Lagombi Ear+
description: An impressive Lagombi ear. Highly developed, it can be sharp as steel if polished.

name: Lagombi Plastron
description: Shell piece from a Lagombi's belly. Its ridges allow the Lagombi to slide on ice.

name: Lagombi Plastron+
description: A strong, sticky, and thick Lagombi Plastron. Used to make superior equipment.

name: Lagombi Iceclaw
description: A Lagombi claw that's cold to the touch. Permanently covered in ice.

name: Lagombi Frozenclaw
description: A Lagombi claw surrounded by cold air. Wounds it causes freeze over in an instant.

name: Volvidon Shell
description: The heat-resistant shell of a Volvidon. Unaffected even by boiling lava.

name: Volvidon Carapace
description: A thick Volvidon carapace. The elasticity means forging it requires severe pressure.

name: Volvidon Claw
description: A claw from a Volvidon's foreleg. Dramatically raises the power of a wide swing.

name: Volvidon Claw+
description: A hard, sharp Volvidon claw. Constant exposure to heat has tempered it like steel.

name: Volvidon Rickrack
description: The jagged shell of a Volvidon's back. Its high elasticity makes it ideal for crafting flexible gear.

name: Aknosom Scale
description: An Aknosom scale that glows with a stunning ivory light. A popular material.

name: Aknosom Feather
description: Feathered Aknosom scale treasured for its use in umbrellas. Sturdy yet light.

name: Aknosom Scale+
description: Armor woven from these beautiful white scales is in demand among royal guards.

name: Aknosom Feather+
description: Quality Aknosom feather. Swing it like a blade or layer it into a shield.

name: Aknosom Crest
description: An Aknosom comb. The eyeball motif on the forehead shows up in many a ghost story.

name: Aknosom Crest+
description: Giant and flashy, this Aknosom comb looks like an elegant decorative fan.

name: Aknosom Beak
description: Aknosom beak that appears to be wearing lipstick. Used in arts and crafts.

name: Spongy Hide
description: Spongin from a Royal Ludroth's mane. Valued for its elasticity and high water retention.

name: Spongy Hide+
description: High-grade elastic hide that boasts a remarkable ability to retain water.

name: Royal Ludroth Scale
description: A small scale that enables graceful movement. You need several to forge equipment.

name: Royal Ludroth Scale+
description: A large, strong scale from a Royal Ludroth. It reflects light in every direction.

name: Royal Ludroth Claw
description: A claw from a Royal Ludroth. Adapted better to movement than to attacking.

name: Royal Ludroth Claw+
description: A sharp, pointed Royal Ludroth claw. It plunges deep into the earth with each step taken.

name: Royal Ludroth Crest
description: These crests become rigid when the beast is angry; quantity indicates status.

name: Royal Ludroth Crest+
description: A proud, strong crest befitting a pack leader. Its sharp horns shine magnificently.

name: Royal Ludroth Tail
description: The finned tail of a Royal Ludroth, used by fishermen for their boats.

name: Barroth Shell
description: Shell from a Barroth. It's pretty muddy, but that's why it's so strong.

name: Barroth Carapace
description: A Barroth's carapace coated in multiple layers of mud, making it quite rigid.

name: Barroth Ridge
description: Plate taken from a Barroth's back. Fairly rare, but makes for quality material.

name: Barroth Ridge+
description: A thick, sturdy part of a Barroth backplate. Mud and sunlight have helped to harden it further.

name: Barroth Claw
description: A Barroth claw. It's not too sharp, but can be used to strengthen many things.

name: Barroth Claw+
description: A polished claw sharpened by sand and dirt. It can dig through even the toughest earth.

name: Barroth Scalp
description: This durable part of a Barroth's skull is also the hardest to remove.

name: Barroth Tail
description: Barroth tails aren't very valuable, but the meat is hailed as a delicacy.

name: Fertile Mud
description: Mud that Barroth roll around in. Nutrient-rich and great for farming.

name: Rich Mud
description: Highly nutritious mud. While it makes great fertilizer, it works for weapons too!

name: Flabby Hide
description: Now useable as a material thanks to recent advances. Has mysterious properties.

name: Pearl Hide
description: The hide of a Khezu. Its strange properties are still not fully understood.

name: Suspicious Fang
description: These fangs are popular with occult fans and sold on the black market as cursed items.

name: Suspicious Fang+
description: Having slurped up mounds of flesh, these fangs are used in certain rituals.

name: Pale Bone
description: The rib bone from a Khezu. Still has chunks of meat attached.

name: Pale Steak
description: Fatty meat from a Khezu. Looks tasty, but cannot be eaten.

name: Tetranadon Hide
description: Made from Tetranadon belly, it's very stretchy. Now you can eat as much as you want!

name: Tetranadon Hide+
description: A life of constant combat has made this belly skin sturdy and stretchy as well.

name: Tetra Carapace
description: This shell's mossy surface acts as a cushion, making it sturdier than it looks.

name: Tetra Carapace+
description: Carapace stout enough to send any back-attacking predators packing.

name: Tetranadon Beak
description: You can store up water in this Tetranadon beak. Great for gear that uses water.

name: Tetranadon Beak+
description: This Tetranadon beak can shoot water at high pressure due to a refined structure.

name: Tetranadon Disc
description: Disc-shaped bone that protects a Tetranadon's moisturizing organ from foes.

name: Tetranadon Disc+
description: Unscathed, this disc-shaped head bone can fetch a high price as a luxury plate.

name: Bishaten Fur
description: Thick fur from around a Bishaten's neck. Protects its neck from hungry jaws.

name: Bishaten Fur+
description: Quality Bishaten fur that stays orderly under vigorous treatment. High utility.

name: Bishaten Talon
description: Bishaten claws may be small, but don't be fooled—they'll tear you to shreds.

name: Bishaten Talon+
description: These claws are a good omen for those who see the beast as a servant of the gods.

name: Bishaten Feather
description: These feathers let Bishaten go wild, providing stability while on their hind legs.

name: Bishaten Feather+
description: High-quality Bishaten feather. Light blue plumage traces the beast's wild movements.

name: Bishaten Horn
description: Bishaten horn resembling a monk's hat. Wearing it makes you smarter, supposedly.

name: Bishaten Horn+
description: Bishaten horn resembling a monk's hat. The bigger the horn, the slyer the beast.

name: Bishaten Tailcase+
description: Robust tail carapace that is so hard, it can even break through rocks.

name: Bisha Tailcase
description: Tail carapace that is super hard. Can be swung around like a ball on a chain.

name: Pukei-Pukei Scale
description: Many a hunter has been charmed by the deep forest- green hue of these scales.

name: Pukei-Pukei Scale+
description: Light and sturdy. With a little work, this could let you blend into the woods.

name: Pukei-Pukei Shell
description: The shade of green varies slightly depending on where it was harvested from.

name: Pukei-Pukei Quill
description: Green feather taken from a Pukei-Pukei wing. Has many decorative uses.

name: Pukei-Pukei Carapace
description: The surface of this carapace is exceptionally hard; great for making armor.

name: Pukei-Pukei Wing
description: This wing membrane is highly elastic and resistant to poison, giving it many uses.

name: Pukei-Pukei Sac
description: A Pukei-Pukei dewlap. Holds a digestive poison that dissolves plants.

name: Pukei-Pukei Sac+
description: Large dewlap that amps up poison production and potency by a large margin.

name: Pukei-Pukei Tail
description: The striped pattern isn't everyone's cup of tea, but some hunters dig it.

name: Jyuratodus Scale+
description: Mud sticks to this scale, building up and increasing its thickness over time.

name: Jyuratodus Carapace
description: Sturdy mud-caked Jyuratodus carapace. The mud layer boosts defense greatly.

name: Jyuratodus Fang+
description: Once this fang gets a hold of you, it wont let go until you're drowning in mud.

name: Jyuratodus Fin+
description: Using this flexible fin, the Jyuratodus is able to easily glide through the mud.

name: Basarios Shell
description: Rock-hard Basarios shell. Can be used to refine metals.

name: Basarios Carapace
description: A rigid Basarios shell. The amount of ore in it makes it closer to rock than shell.

name: Basarios Pleura
description: The shell that covers a Basarios' torso. Relatively thin and easy to manipulate.

name: Basarios Pleura+
description: The rigid shell that covers a Basarios' torso. Still thin but far denser than usual.

name: Basarios Wing
description: The wing of a Basarios. Very hard to work as a material.

name: Basarios Tail
description: A stubby Basarios tail composed of minerals more durable than ore.

name: Basarios Tears
description: Faintly pink gems found near the tear ducts of a Basarios.

name: Somnacanth Scale
description: Somnacanth scale that glistens a brilliant yellow due to its watery coating.

name: Somnacanth Scale+
description: Quality Somnacanth scale that shimmers a brilliant gold under moonlight.

name: Somnacanth Shell
description: A spiked Somnacanth carapace built for protection and cutting through water.

name: Somnacanth Shell+
description: This robust carapace lures in victims with its beauty and ruthlessly crushes them.

name: Somnacanth Claw
description: A claw with a long, hooked shape that's great for weapons, but also farm work!

name: Somnacanth Claw+
description: Somnacanth's well-developed claw. So sharp and tough that it'll easily tear through prey like butter.

name: Somnacanth Fin
description: A Somnacanth head-fin. As beautiful as the midnight sea. Careful with the barbs!

name: Somnacanth Fin+
description: In legends, these fins were thought to be the souls of those who had died at sea.

name: Somnacanth Dust
description: A glimmering blue powder shot from a Somnacanth's neck. Makes you feel sleepy.

name: Somnacanth Sedative
description: Shimmers like the falling tears of a weeping maiden, ushering in a deep sleep.

name: Rathian Scale
description: Scales of a Rathian. Their dark emerald hue exudes a feminine grace.

name: Rathian Shell
description: A shell piece comprised of layered scales, making it much harder than just one.

name: Rathian Scale+
description: A superior Rathian scale. Looks like a normal Rathian scale, but is much harder.

name: Rathian Carapace
description: Rathian shell prized for its lavish green coloration. An excellent armor material.

name: Rathian Webbing
description: This heat-resistant material is often used as armor lining.

name: Rathian Spike
description: Needle-like hair found on a Rathian's back and wings. They contain poison.

name: Rathian Spike+
description: As sharp as the keenest blade. It is longer and sturdier than other spikes.

name: Rathian Ruby
description: A rare, precious gem from inside a wyvern. Almost too nice to use.

name: Rathian Plate
description: A searing tail scale. Hard to come by and as fiery as the wyvern it came from.

name: Rath Wingtalon
description: Claws that are moderately difficult to work with. A blacksmith's first test.

name: Rath Wingtalon+
description: Razor-sharp wing talons. Could slice through a tree trunk with ease.

name: Rath Marrow
description: Recent advances allow this marrow to be extracted. It ignites on air contact.

name: Rath Medulla
description: Only recently extractable due to advances in carving techniques. Hard to forge.

name: Barioth Shell
description: White shell from a Barioth. It's strong yet incredibly light.

name: Barioth Carapace
description: A Barioth carapace with an impressive shine. Strongly resembles an ice floe.

name: Barioth Pelt+
description: A high-quality white pelt with a lovely texture. Nobles use it as a symbol of authority.

name: Barioth Pelt
description: A white pelt that's soft to the touch. Absorbs impact almost as well as a Barioth.

name: Barioth Claw
description: A deceptively sharp Barioth claw that can carve through thick glaciers.

name: Barioth Claw+
description: A claw honed in the harsh Tundra environment. It can take down prey with a single swipe.

name: Barioth Spike
description: These come in many sizes, and assist the Barioth in clinging to walls of ice.

name: Barioth Tail
description: Barioth tails are covered in hard plate, and surprisingly tough to sever.

name: Amber Fang
description: A fang from a Barioth. Can be used for weapons, but also for decoration.

name: Amber Fang+
description: Amber tusks sharpened by countless kills. Can smash through gigantic ice blocks.

name: Tobi-Kadachi Scale
description: A Tobi-Kadachi scale. Armor made from these is shockingly light.

name: Tobi-Kadachi Scale+
description: A quality scale that is flexible as a feather, and light as the wind.

name: Tobi-Kadachi Pelt
description: Prone to generating static electricity—its hairs are constantly on end.

name: Tobi-Kadachi Pelt+
description: The bolt-upright hairs are an indication of the strong electricity flowing inside.

name: Tobi-Kadachi Claw
description: These sharp-hooked Tobi- Kadachi claws are perfect for zipping up trees.

name: Tobi-Kadachi Membrane
description: A film that is thin enough to see through, but strong enough to catch the wind.

name: Tobi-Kadachi Claw+
description: Tobi-Kadachi use these razor-sharp claws to move around in the trees.

name: Tobi-Kadachi Electrode
description: Spikes made of a highly conductive material. Great for gear using electricity.

name: Tobi-Kadachi Electrode+
description: Conductive electrode that builds up and unleashes purple bolts of electricity.

name: Magnamalo Scale
description: Sturdy and small Magnamalo scale that is flexible and resistant to fangs.

name: Magnamalo Scale+
description: Glows a piercing purple, imbued with the beast's infinite fighting spirit.

name: Magnamalo Shell
description: An armor-like carapace from Magnamalo. Won't budge to any run-of-the-mill strikes.

name: Magnamalo Shell+
description: Carapace hardened by malice. So sturdy, it won't buckle to any attack.

name: Magnamalo Blade
description: A claw that has grown into a blade shape on Magnamalo's forearm. Already very sharp.

name: Magnamalo Blade+
description: Honed by blood, these arm blades cut prey in two with a single swipe.

name: Magnamalo Scute
description: Bladed hide of Magnamalo's back. Its edge is nicked from countless battles.

name: Magnamalo Horn+
description: Horns resembling a general's helmet. Said to grow as one feasts on the defeated.

name: Magnamalo Horn
description: Majestic Magnamalo horn that echoes with the sorrow of warriors slain.

name: Magnamalo Tail
description: Magnamalo's bladed tail. Used to pierce through the guts of unsuspecting prey.

name: Magna Ghostprism
description: A gaseous crystal that emits flammable gas resembling dancing purple flames.

name: Magna Soulprism
description: A crystal of condensed gas. Its quiet exterior belies its savage explosive power.

name: Magnamalo Plate
description: Rare Magnamalo scale. Glows with a deep purple, all-consuming menace.

name: Purple Magna Orb
description: This jewel glows a sinister purple as though holding many unfortunate souls.

name: Anjanath Scale
description: Tempered by the heat of an Anjanath, this scale repels any ordinary blade.

name: Anjanath Scale+
description: Constantly subjected to forge temperatures, these scales are as hard as iron.

name: Anjanath Pelt
description: This Anjanath fur is used by local firefighters for its fire-resistant properties.

name: Anjanath Pelt+
description: Quality pelt treated as a luxury item for its stoutness and healthy coat.

name: Anjanath Fang
description: Fang shaped by the extreme pressure and heat of an Anjanath's mouth.

name: Anjanath Fang+
description: Fang of a particularly vicious Anjanath. Tears through any and all prey.

name: Anjanath Nosebone
description: Nasal bone of an Anjanath. Its characteristic structure is a hot research topic.

name: Anjanath Nosebone+
description: Nasal bones only grow to be this large in beasts that survive countless battles.

name: Anjanath Tail
description: This Anjanath tail can be used in weapons, but it's also a local delicacy.

name: Anjanath Plate
description: Rare, roiled Anjanath plating, produced by the beast's persistent rage.

name: Nargacuga Scale
description: A scale from a Nargacuga. The surface is covered with the beast's black fur.

name: Nargacuga Scale+
description: A black Nargacuga scale. Despite its hardness, it's surprisingly light and smooth.

name: Anjanath Gem
description: Rare jewel from within an Anjanath. Tinged with fire, it shines gallantly.

name: Nargacuga Blackfur
description: Black fur that grows on scales. Covers the animal in jet-black darkness.

name: Nargacuga Pelt+
description: Pitch-black fur from a Nargacuga. It absorbs light and emits pure darkness.

name: Nargacuga Tail
description: A Nargacuga's impressive tail. Might be mistaken for a weapon if seen out of context.

name: Narga Tailspike
description: A spiky scale from a Nargacuga tail. It stands up when the beast is enraged.

name: Nargacuga Cutwing
description: Blade-like Nargacuga wing. Evolved to cut down prey on the fly.

name: Narga Razor
description: The large, sharp bladewing of a Nargacuga. It can slice through foes in a flash.

name: Nargacuga Fang
description: Although small, the jagged placement of these fangs aids their cutting ability.

name: Nargacuga Fang+
description: A Nargacuga's terribly sharp fang. Evolved to tear rather than chew.

name: Nargacuga Marrow
description: Marrow as nimble as the Nargacuga itself; requires talent to properly harvest.

name: Mizutsune Scale
description: A transparent Mizutsune scale. Its irregular shape refracts light into many bright colors.

name: Mizutsune Scale+
description: A quality Mizutsune scale. Older scales polished over time can be very valuable.

name: Narga Medulla
description: A Nargacuga's medulla. Merely touching it causes extreme pain, making crafting quite difficult.

name: Mizutsune Purplefur
description: The purple fur of a Mizutsune. Stiff, but is soft as silk when soaked with bubblefoam.

name: Mizutsune Purplefur+
description: High-quality purple fur. More foam-absorbent than its lighter counterpart.

name: Mizutsune Claw
description: A claw that flies freely through bubblefoam, allowing it to be used as a spike.

name: Mizutsune Claw+
description: Friction-reducing bubblefoam helps this deadly claw slice through prey like sushi.

name: Mizutsune Fin
description: A beautiful brocade-like fin. Males have large fins that turn red to match their mood.

name: Mizutsune Fin+
description: A high-quality fin. Bubble- foam gives it an elegant pattern prettier than dye.

name: Mizutsune Tail
description: A flowing Mizutsune tail. It's prized for its supple fur and beautiful scales.

name: Bubblefoam
description: Fluid secreted by Mizutsune. Just a few drops can turn a swamp into a bubble bath.

name: Bubblefoam+
description: The top layer of Mizutsune fluid. Removes impurities and is used in many rituals.

name: Mizutsune Plate
description: An ancient scale as old as its former owner. Can even create rainbows from light.

name: Mizutsune Water Orb
description: A multicolored orb formed from a crystalized Mizutsune scale and bubblefoam.

name: Goss Harag Fur
description: This Goss hair repels snow and keeps heat in, making it popular for winter wear.

name: Goss Harag Fur+
description: Goss hair is fought over in snowy lands for its warming and protective qualities.

name: Goss Harag Hide
description: The Goss Harag's warm body and the cold outside air have tempered this hide.

name: Goss Harag Claw+
description: These rough claws have stomped through ice and slashed countless beasts.

name: Goss Harag Claw
description: Goss Harag claws. They grow not only from its toes, but also all over its feet!

name: Goss Harag Hide+
description: Freezing air and boiling Goss blood have made this skin harder than most armor.

name: Goss Harag Brace
description: Ice and snow have built up on this arm carapace until it could work as a weapon.

name: Goss Harag Brace+
description: Arm carapace thickened by the reckless behavior of a Goss Harag.

name: Goss Harag Horn
description: Lumpy blue horns of a Goss Harag. For some reason, they tend to scare children.

name: Goss Harag Horn+
description: These horns are sometimes seen as bad luck due to their demonic shape.

name: Block of Ice
description: The Goss Harag melts snow on its body, forming this ice clump on its legs at will.

name: Block of Ice+
description: Any blade or gauntlet made from this ice is sure to freeze children in terror.

name: Goss Harag Bile
description: A Goss Harag gallbladder once prized as a panacea. Good luck getting it out...

name: Rathalos Scale
description: A Rathalos scale. Wyvern scales like this one are fundamental materials.

name: Rathalos Scale+
description: An extraordinarily durable scale carved from the body of a Rathalos.

name: Rathalos Shell
description: A shell piece comprised of layered scales, making it much harder than just one.

name: Rathalos Carapace
description: This Rathalos shell emanates a nobility befitting the ruler of the skies.

name: Rathalos Webbing
description: This heat-resistant material is often used as armor lining.

name: Rathalos Wing
description: A wing from a Rathalos. Skilled artisans can craft it into strong equipment.

name: Rathalos Tail
description: A severed Rathalos tail. It has any number of uses.

name: Rathalos Plate
description: A searing tail scale. Hard to come by and as fiery as the wyvern it came from.

name: Rathalos Ruby
description: A rare, precious gem from inside a wyvern. Almost too nice to use.

name: Almudron Scale
description: Highly water-repellent Almudron scale. Allows for unhindered bog traversal.

name: Almudron Scale+
description: A quality Almudron scale. Polished by mud over many years, it's a work of art.

name: Almudron Shell
description: Overlapping scales fused with mud and Almudron mucus to form an outer shell.

name: Almudron Shell+
description: You could make a shield from the many hardened layers of bodily fluid and mud alone.

name: Almudron Claw
description: Almudron claws that excel at speedy digging. Dirt fears them.

name: Almudron Claw+
description: Sharp Almudron claw that tears through earth like water.

name: Almudron Fin
description: Red tuft of Almudron hair. Covered in a viscous fluid secreted from its pores.

name: Almudron Whisker
description: These crimson Almudron whiskers sense vibrations to help locate prey.

name: Almudron Fin+
description: Fin-like tuft of hair that causes mud waves and whirlpools with every move.

name: Almudron Whisker+
description: The longer the whiskers, the better they can sense vibration. Intruders beware.

name: Almudron Tail
description: An impressive Almudron tail. Its willow-esque droop opens up opportunities to strike.

name: Golden Muck
description: Mud mixed with Almudron mucus. Prized for its viscosity and sumptuous hue.

name: Golden Almudron Orb
description: The contrast of cloudy dull hues and brilliant gold in this jewel is one-of-a-kind.

name: Golden Sludge
description: Mud with high levels of mucus. Coveted by smiths for its miraculous properties.

name: Almudron Plate
description: Rare Almudron scale. As you stare into its gray hue, you feel sucked in.

name: Zinogre Shell
description: A blue-green shell which stores electricity and works as a protective insulator.

name: Zinogre Carapace
description: The carapace of a Zinogre. Its magnificence reveals the futility of facing it.

name: Zinogre Shockfur
description: White fur that stores and magnifies electricity, which it holds even after carving.

name: Zinogre Electrofur
description: Zinogre fur said to store lots of electricity. Shines white from the charge.

name: Zinogre Horn
description: The Zinogre's magnificent horn, which sends most of nature running for cover.

name: Zinogre Horn+
description: A pointed Zinogre horn. When carved, it grants equipment incomparable power.

name: Zinogre Claw
description: A sharp and tremendously powerful claw capable of quickly dicing up prey.

name: Zinogre Tail
description: The plate-covered tail of a Zinogre. It wields deadly force when swung.

name: Zinogre Claw+
description: A high voltage Zinogre claw. Its electrified attacks are truly brutal.

name: Zinogre Shocker
description: The ocher shell that once lined a Zinogre's body. Contains conductive lipids.

name: Zinogre Shocker+
description: An electrically charged Zinogre shell. Grants a thunder god's power to gear.

name: Fulgurbug
description: Thunderbugs which have been stimulated by Zinogre. They emit a pale blue light.

name: Zinogre Plate
description: A rare and intimidating trophy that seems to pulse with residual fury.

name: Zinogre Jasper
description: A rare gem sometimes produced inside a Zinogre's body. The beast's power swells within.

name: Tigrex Scale
description: Scale from the incredibly violent Tigrex. Incredibly massive and sturdy.

name: Tigrex Shell
description: A hard Tigrex shell capable of repelling any impact. Extreme tenacity.

name: Tigrex Scale+
description: A flawless Tigrex scale. Can be fastened with others to become harder than steel.

name: Tigrex Claw
description: A vicious foreclaw unique to the Tigrex. Known for its insidious biting edge.

name: Tigrex Carapace
description: A material hardened by the sands of time. Sharp edges show the Tigrex's ferocity.

name: Tigrex Claw+
description: A claw that time has sharpened into a horrible death sentence for prey.

name: Tigrex Fang+
description: The sharp fang of a Tigrex. These fangs can cut any prey to shreds.

name: Tigrex Tail
description: This flexible and strong tail can make great equipment.

name: Tigrex Scalp
description: Part of the head of a Tigrex. Looks terrifying, as if it is still alive.

name: Tigrex Maw
description: The awe-inspiring jaws of a Tigrex, ready to crush both bone and spirit.

name: Diablos Shell
description: Shell from a Diablos. It's incredibly dense, and much heavier than it looks.

name: Diablos Carapace
description: A quality Diablos carapace, buffed and hardened by constant exposure to sand.

name: Diablos Ridge
description: A rigid Diablos backplate. Can be carved into fine gear with the right knife skills.

name: Diablos Tailcase
description: An armored tailcase that puts iron hammers to shame. This material is a keeper.

name: Diablos Ridge+
description: A particularly thick, hard Diablos carapace. Sturdy, but a pain to carve off.

name: Diablos Fang
description: A large, sturdy fang used in everything from weapons to ornaments.

name: Majestic Horn
description: A twisted Diablos horn in great shape. Use it to make more powerful weapons.

name: Twisted Horn
description: A twisted Diablos horn. Used in this region for many (less twisted) purposes.

name: Diablos Marrow
description: Diablos bone marrow. Recently discovered to have superb binding properties.

name: Diablos Medulla
description: A rare medulla. Difficult to remove, but of great interest to researchers.

name: Rakna-Kadaki Silk
description: Quality Rakna-Kadaki silk. A garb woven from this silk is sure to cushion any blow.

name: Rakna-Kadaki Carapace
description: Hard, heavy Rakna-Kadaki carapace sometimes used in weapons and armor.

name: Rakna-Kadaki Sharpclaw
description: A Rakna-Kadaki claw. Capable of such a punch, it could shatter a dragon's hide.

name: Rakna-Kadaki Spike
description: A spike that has a charming curve. Used in weapons as well as for decoration.

name: Rakna-Kadaki Glowgut
description: A Rakna-Kadaki organ that glows alluringly, but burns with magmatic heat.

name: Daora Carapace
description: A shell hardened by time. Crafting with it is incredibly difficult.

name: Daora Dragon Scale+
description: High-quality scale from Kushala Daora. It is said to surpass steel.

name: Daora Webbing
description: A lightweight yet sturdy Kushala Daora wing. Shines a dull silver when polished.

name: Daora Horn+
description: A fierce-looking horn that instantly robs the body of cold if handled improperly.

name: Daora Tail
description: Cut from Kushala Daora. Incredibly destructive power contained within.

name: Daora Claw+
description: Even now the black gleam of this claw seems to emit a life force.

name: Chameleos Hide+
description: Superior hide of a Chameleos. Strange to the touch, but very durable.

name: Daora Gem
description: A rare gem formed inside a Daora. Its glow is breathtaking.

name: Chameleos Spike
description: A sharp horn of a Chameleos. Strong and hard, but strangely easy to work with.

name: Chameleos Claw+
description: Sharpened claw of a Chameleos. Small and sharp, but still valued for being easy to work with.

name: Chameleos Tail
description: The distinctive tail of Chameleos. Feels very strange.

name: Chameleos Wing
description: While this material is strong, the surface's weird texture is its highlight.

name: Chameleos Gem
description: A rare gem formed inside Chameleos. It has a multi-colored glow.

name: Teostra Carapace
description: Harder than Teostra Shell. Looks like red-hot steel; particularly eye catching.

name: Teostra Mane
description: This majestic mane is a sure sign of Teostra's regality.

name: Teostra Tail
description: Covered in red scales, the tree-like tail of Teostra is incredibly hard to cut.

name: Teostra Horn+
description: A sharp horn that burns with the fury of Teostra. It is tinged with fire.

name: Fire Dragon Scale+
description: Scale that seems to burn with the majesty of a fire dragon.

name: Teostra Claw+
description: The blow of this ever-hot claw awaits those who evade the fiery breath of Teostra.

name: Teostra Webbing
description: A Teostra wing that repels any flame. You sense strength and valor in it.

name: Teostra Powder
description: Powder from fire dragon wings. Said to magnify a material's abilities.

name: Teostra Gem
description: A rare gem formed inside a fire dragon. Flickers with ferocious flames.

name: Rajang Horn+
description: The majestic golden horn of a Rajang. Hunters yearn for the heroism it represents.

name: Rajang Fang+
description: This sharpened fang can cut through anything dumb enough to touch it.

name: Rajang Blackfur
description: Black Rajang fur. When crafted, the resulting cloth is desired even by royalty.

name: Rajang Claw+
description: A sharp Rajang claw. Difficult to carve and more difficult to craft.

name: Rajang Tail
description: The glistening tail of a Rajang. The golden fur is beautiful and elegant.

name: Gold Rajang Pelt
description: Fur taken from a Rajang's body. The golden hair is treasured by tailors.

name: Bazelgeuse Scale+
description: It appears that this would dampen violent impacts. Shines a dull silver.

name: Bazelgeuse Carapace
description: Strong enough to entirely ignore the harsh explosions of Bazelgeuse scales.

name: Bazelgeuse Tail
description: This tail is packed with explosive scales; each one could take out your house!

name: Bazelgeuse Fuse
description: Explosive fluid-producing organ. Drop it, and you'll be standing in a crater.

name: Bazelgeuse Talon
description: These massive honed claws are the incarnation of destructive force.

name: Bazelgeuse Wing
description: Massive wing developed to chase prey to the ends of the earth.

name: Bazelgeuse Gem
description: Those drawn in by this jewel's glow instantly snap into a maddened rage.

name: Ibushi Hide+
description: Rigid enough to repel blades yet flexible as rubber, this hide fends off all attacks.

name: Ibushi Carapace
description: Carapace of Ibushi. Oddly, the skin is hard, elastic, and also lightweight.

name: Ibushi Claw+
description: One swipe with this pointy claw disfigures the land with a gust-like blow.

name: Ibushi Horn+
description: Careful polishing could turn this horn into a graceful, gleaming azure blade.

name: Ibushi Windsac
description: Organ that stores and emits air. Inflates to float on self-created drafts.

name: Ibushi Bluespike
description: Countless rock-hard spikes prevent airborne enemies from getting close.

name: Wind Serpent Orb
description: This jewel shimmers with the rage of a typhoon. Its holder commands the storm.

name: Narwa Hide+
description: Hide so well insulated, it makes lightning strikes feel like bug bites.

name: Narwa Carapace
description: Flexible and lightweight carapace that courses with flesh-singeing electricity.

name: Narwa Claw+
description: A sharp claw that once sliced up any foolish enough to attack Narwa.

name: Narwa Horn+
description: Narwa's horn. Shoots out bolts of lightning when swung; handle with caution.

name: Narwa Sparksac
description: This lightning-emitting organ creates a magnetic field to enable floating.

name: Narwa Tentacle
description: Tentacles that cover Narwa's body. It uses them to shroud itself in lightning.

name: Thunder Serpent Orb
description: This jewel shimmers with the ire of lightning. Its holder can tame thunder.

name: Scale of Origin
description: Ultramarine and golden yellow collide like the sky and screaming lightning.

name: Horn of Origin
description: This horn dominates gales dancing across the sky and earth-splitting thunder.

name: Orb of Origin
description: Within this jewel from the Allmother dance father wind and mother lightning.

name: Shimmering Scale
description: Valstrax scale slightly tinged by the crimson eclipse. Portends disaster.

name: Gleaming Shell
description: Valstrax carapace capable of withstanding sonic speed and boiling heat.

name: Valstrax Claw+
description: This piece of Valstrax claw is remarkably hard and sharp. It's torn up countless peacetimes.

name: Valstrax Tail
description: A large Valstrax tail that shines like a comet. Effortlessly sweeps aside all tranquility.

name: Valstrax Spineshell
description: A Valstrax shell used for back protection. Its sharp points look like blades.

name: Red Dragon Orb
description: The source of evil heavenly omens. Fly fleetly, as a comet 'cross the skies.

name: Rouge Spikewing
description: Touched by the crimson eclipse, this wing phases in an otherwordly fashion.

name: Crimson Liquid
description: Merely touching this boiling hot draconic fluid fills your mind with catastrophe.

name: Apex Beastclaw
description: Forearm carapace of an Apex Arzuros. Countless scars show its dances with death.

name: Apex Bubblefoam
description: A single drop of this fluid can turn a wasteland into a foamy ocean paradise.

name: Apex Venom Spike
description: Sword-like hair of an Apex Rathian. Appears to have bent and regrown stronger.

name: Apex Blaze Sac
description: An Apex Rathalos organ. Lets loose fire tinged with unfocused rage.

name: Apex Curlhorn
description: You can see the beast's will to live from the scars this horn has endured.

name: Dango Ticket
description: A ticket for dango full of carefully selected, special ingredients.

name: Lottery Ticket
description: This ticket can be redeemed for a free turn at the lottery during Kagero's sales.

name: Apex Shockshell
description: Battle-scarred carapace of an Apex Zinogre. Surges with electricity when disgraced.

name: Lagniapple
description: An apple popular amongst Felyne connoisseurs. Prized by trainers and handlers.

name: Outfit Voucher
description: A ticket needed to forge layered armor. For the fashion-conscious hunter.

name: High Commendation
description: A ticket awarded for immense courage. Collect them and maybe wonderful things will happen!

name: Commendation
description: A ticket awarded for showing courage. Collect them and maybe wonderful things will happen!

name: Buddy Ticket
description: Proof of you and your Buddies' rapport. Collect enough of them and it might pay off.

name: Defender Ticket 1
description: A token of thanks given to those who defended Kamura. Use it to Ramp-Up equipment.

name: Friend Voucher
description: A ticket awarded as a token of hunting camaraderie. Use it with the Melding Pot.

name: Kamura Ticket
description: Received for contributions to Kamura Village. If you give it to the Smithy...

name: Guild Ticket
description: A ticket issued by the Guild Master to those who have aided the Guild.

name: Defender Ticket 2
description: A token of thanks given to those who defended Kamura. Use it to Ramp-Up equipment.

name: Defender Ticket 3
description: A token of thanks given to those who defended Kamura. Use it to Ramp-Up equipment.

name: Defender Ticket 5
description: A token of thanks given to those who defended Kamura. Use it to Ramp-Up equipment.

name: Defender Ticket 4
description: A token of thanks given to those who defended Kamura. Use it to Ramp-Up equipment.

name: Defender Ticket 8
description: A token of thanks given to those who defended Kamura. Use it to Ramp-Up equipment.

name: Defender Ticket 7
description: A token of thanks given to those who defended Kamura. Use it to Ramp-Up equipment.

name: Defender Ticket 9
description: A token of thanks given to those who defended Kamura. Use it to Ramp-Up equipment.

name: Defender Ticket 6
description: A token of thanks given to those who defended Kamura. Use it to Ramp-Up equipment.

name: Kulu Coin
description: A coin given to those who have bested a Kulu-Ya-Ku in the Arena.

name: Barroth Coin
description: A coin given to those who have bested a Barroth in the Arena.

name: Nargacuga Coin
description: A coin given to those who have bested a Nargacuga in the Arena.

name: Barioth Coin
description: A coin given to those who have bested a Barioth in the Arena.

name: Rajang Coin
description: A coin given to those who have bested a Rajang in the Arena.

name: Bazelgeuse Coin
description: A coin given to those who have bested a Bazelgeuse in the Arena.

name: Hunter King Coin
description: A silver coin given to true hunters. Shines with all the glory of the Hunter King.

name: Pinnacle Coin
description: A commemorative coin bestowed on hunters who have mastered the craft. The value of its sheen? Priceless.

name: Ace Hunter Coin
description: A golden coin given to hunters at the pinnacle of their field. Only a small handful ever know such honor.

name: Goldenfry
description: A small, rare, gold fish. Commands a high price.

name: Bhernastone
description: A decorative jewel imported from a rustic village. Fetches a good price.

name: Dundormarin
description: A decorative jewel imported from a mountain village. Fetches a good price.

name: Loc Lac Ore
description: A decorative jewel imported from a desert town. Fetches a good price.

name: Val Habar Quartz
description: A decorative jewel imported from a market of caravans. Fetches a good price.

name: Minegardenite
description: A decorative jewel imported from a hunting village. Fetches a good price.

name: Steel Egg
description: An egg of glittering steel. Rare but useless to hunters. Fetches a good price.

name: Silver Egg
description: An egg of glittering silver. Rare but useless to hunters. Fetches a very good price.

name: Wisdom Crystal
description: Crystal said to grant wisdom. Spectacles made from it offer an intelligent facade.

name: Wild Dark Leather
description: Jet-black, glossy leather. Exudes an untamable flair. Material used for leg armor.

name: Golden Egg
description: An egg of glittering gold. Incredibly valuable. Sells for a fortune.

name: Shady Crystal
description: Emits a unique aura due to the light it absorbs. Material used to make stylish glasses.

name: Celestial Scroll
description: A scroll depicting the divine beauty of Amaterasu. Used to forge Palamute layered armor.

name: Disguise Device
description: Item used by a disguise-loving Palico. Used to forge layered armor in her image.

name: Satsui no Hado
description: A dark form of energy. Can be used to create layered armor of a most brutal warrior.

name: Dog Bolts
description: Spare parts to create a trusty support robot. Used to forge Palamute layered armor.

name: Broken Knight Armor
description: Armor shattered by some kind of attack. Used to forge a courageous knight's outfit.

name: Diving Ticket
description: A ticket that can be exchanged for layered armor that is perfect for jumping in the ocean.

name: Winter Star Ticket
description: A ticket once used by a certain research commission. Exchange for toasty-looking layered armor.

name: Ore of Origin
description: Said to be the first ore mined by a legendary hunter. Can be used for layered armor.

name: Appreciation Ticket
description: A ticket once used by a certain research commission. Exchange for extravagant layered armor.

name: Spring Blossom Ticket
description: A ticket once used by a certain research commission. Exchange for gorgeous layered armor.

name: Buddy Ring
description: A Ring obtained by earning Tails's trust. Used to forge layered armor for your Buddy.

name: Hunter Ring
description: A Ring given only to those who Sonic deems worthy. Used to forge cool layered armor.

name: Azure Era Seal
description: A seal of honor from USJ. Its bearer's name shall resonate with honor the world over.

name: Eurekacorn
description: An acorn popular amongst studious Felynes. Enhances the memory of Buddies.

name: Azure Era Gem
description: A special gift from USJ. Some say its sapphire glow guides onlookers to a brighter future.

name: MP Accelerant
description: Speeds up the melding pot. Still a prototype, this pill is only usable in the Kingdom.

name: Melding Pudding
description: Crucial melding pot material. One drop is enough to drama- tically alter the outcome.

name: Melding Nectar
description: Handy melding pot material. Made from new vegetation discovered in Elgado.

name: Melding Honey
description: Useful melding pot material. Thicker than before, thanks to the efforts of researchers.

name: Rathian Cortex
description: Rathian shell that's heavier than the carapace. Used to reinforce equipment.

name: Rathian Shard
description: A particularly thick Rathian scale. Its large size proves its owner's advanced age.

name: Rathian Weave
description: Excellent heat retention but legendarily very difficult to work with.

name: Rathian Surspike
description: Only a few of these superior spikes grow on a Rathian. It's both sharp and highly toxic.

name: Rathian Mantle
description: A legendary Rathian scale. Those who can craft it rule the earth and seize the sky.

name: Rathalos Cortex
description: Rigid cortex of a Rathalos, both harder and sturdier than its carapace.

name: Rathalos Shard
description: Rathalos part made of many overlapping scales. Its strength's a natural wonder.

name: Rathalos Lash
description: Top-grade Rathalos tail. Strong ones are precious and used in select equipment.

name: Rathalos Fellwing
description: A top-grade Rathalos wing, removed fully. Such majesty befits the King of the Skies.

name: Rathalos Mantle
description: A legendary Rathalos scale. Those who can craft it rule the earth and seize the sky.

name: Rath Wingripper
description: Powerful wyvern wing talon. Hard and sharp enough to rend boulders like paper.

name: Pearl Glosshide
description: Top-quality Khezu hide. Hunters must take caution not to be enraptured by its luster.

name: Mystic Hardfang
description: A glistening Khezu Fang. A wandering blade in thirst of transformative blood.

name: Khezu Special Cut
description: An extremely high-quality cut of lean Khezu flesh. ...Yuck.

name: Basarios Cortex
description: Heavy Basarios shell encrusted with quality ore. Perfectly mimics a stone wall.

name: Basarios Pectus+
description: A large Basarios pectus. Overlapping layers protect the weak point in its chest.

name: Basarios Fellwing
description: A top-grade Basarios wing. It's not great for flying, but highly sought after.

name: Basarios Pallium
description: Legendary Basarios Pallium. Those who can craft it rule the earth and seize the sky.

name: Diablos Chine
description: Tough Diablos backplate, strengthened by burning sands. An ideal material for armor.

name: Diablos Tailcase+
description: A tailcase heavy enough to bend a steel hammer. Boasts unimaginable power.

name: Diablos Cortex
description: The rigid cortex of a Diablos, both harder and sturdier than its carapace.

name: Twisted Stouthorn
description: The stouthorn of a Diablos. Preserving its flawless form is the real challenge.

name: Hermitaur Hardclaw
description: A Daimyo Hermitaur's hard claw. Tough enough to fortify castles.

name: Hermitaur Cortex
description: A Daimyo Hermitaur's tough bone shell. Its thickness makes for strong armor.

name: Timeworn Crimson Horn
description: A bright red horn taken from a Wyvern's head. Old, but dignified.

name: Ceanataur Cortex
description: Thicker than normal Ceanataur bone, this high quality material demands a master craftsman.

name: Ceanataur Hardclaw
description: A top quality claw from a giant Shogun Ceanataur. Reserved for use in the finest equipment.

name: Heavy Ceanataur Leg
description: An extremely thick Shogun Ceanataur leg. The shape is perfect for making weapons.

name: Heavy Wyvern Scalp
description: A Carapaceon shell made from a wyvern's skull that is harder than normal.

name: Fine Black Pearl
description: Largest and most beautiful of all black pearls. Very valuable and hard to find.

name: Rajang Hardhorn
description: A large, majestic golden horn. All who see it feel the over- whelming bravery of its owner.

name: Rajang Hardfang
description: A Rajang fang that cuts through anything. A prey's life vanishes in an instant once caught.

name: Rajang Wildpelt
description: Wild Rajang fur. When forged, the jet-black fur causes the wearer to rage.

name: Rajang Hardclaw
description: A hard Rajang claw that's taken a multitude of lives in a manner best left unsaid.

name: Gold Rajang Pelt+
description: A golden pelt that shimmers with the same furious power as a Rajang.

name: Rajang Apoplexy
description: A long mane which still bristles with rage. The hairs are fine, but robust.

name: Ghoulish Gold Gorer
description: A golden horn that seethes with rage, even now. Not to be touched with bare hands.

name: Rajang Heart
description: A symbol of flesh-searing rage that releases massive power with every beat.

name: Daora Cortex
description: The repeated molting of skin has made this shell near impenetrable.

name: Daora Shard
description: A thick scale from Kushala Daora. The winters have made it strong and cold to the touch.

name: Daora Fellwing
description: A curious wing that's strong as steel, but soft to the touch. Highly sought after material.

name: Daora Hardhorn
description: A hard, ferocious horn that engulfs everything in a freezing wind on impact.

name: Daora Lash
description: The durable tail of Kushala Daora. Strong as any storm, but flexible as well.

name: Daora Hardclaw
description: A robust claw one might mistake for steel. Enhances equipment capabilities.

name: Chameleos Finehide
description: Top-grade Chameleos hide. Its strange texture calms the soul of those who touch it.

name: Chameleos Hardhorn
description: A super-hard horn that refracts light. A highly sought commodity.

name: Chameleos Hardclaw
description: A tough Chameleos claw. Its slender sharpness and strength make it an exceptional weapon.

name: Chameleos Fellwing
description: A top-grade Chameleos wing. The strong, firm frame makes it invaluable as material.

name: Chameleos Lash
description: The tough, hard tail of a Chameleos. The unique texture makes for excellent material.

name: Teostra Cortex
description: Merely looking upon this heavy shell is enough to shatter the hearts of hardened warriors.

name: Teostra Lash
description: The stone-hard tail of a Teostra. A lash from this tail unleashes unimaginable explosions.

name: Teostra Hardhorn
description: A majestic horn that commands all who gaze upon it to bend the knee.

name: Hellfire Shard
description: A shard of particularly fine quality. Difficult to handle due to its high temperature.

name: Teostra Fellwing
description: A Teostra wing. Massively powerful and possesses excellent heat resistance.

name: Fire Dragon Hardclaw
description: A hard, fiery Teostra claw. Causes anything it scratches to burst into flames.

name: Tigrex Shard
description: Thick Tigrex scale, made to withstand both searing heat and the shivering cold.

name: Tigrex Cortex
description: A heavy Tigrex shell. Even the terrible forces of nature cannot penetrate it.

name: Tigrex Hardfang
description: A thick, large Tigrex fang that tore prey into unrecognizable pieces.

name: Tigrex Hardclaw
description: A highly durable Tigrex claw, tempered by the flesh and blood of its prey.

name: Tigrex Lash
description: A top-grade tail from a violent Tigrex. Requires a veteran artisan's skill and experience.

name: Tigrex Mantle
description: A phantasmal Tigrex scale. Those who can craft it rule the earth and seize the sky.

name: Nargacuga Shard
description: A tough, black Nargacuga scale. Thicker than standard scales, but still lightweight.

name: Nargacuga Blackfur+
description: A Nargacuga's black fur. Glossy and resilient, it fends off claws and fangs.

name: Nargacuga Lash
description: A top-flight Nargacuga tail. Flexible and strong, it's an ideal crafting material.

name: Nargacuga Tailspear
description: A first-class Nargacuga tailspike. Sharp and heavy, it can be shockingly deadly.

name: Nargacuga Cutwing+
description: A strong Nargacuga cutwing. Extra-hard, it cleaves foes in twain in a single swing.

name: Nargacuga Hardfang
description: A highly developed Nargacuga fang. Bold and sharp, it can easily slice prey to pieces.

name: Nargacuga Mantle
description: A legendary Nargacuga scale. Those who can craft it rule the earth and seize the sky.

name: Barioth Cortex
description: A cortex from a formidable Barioth. Surprisingly strong and impressively lightweight.

name: Barioth Thickfur
description: Top quality white fur from a Barioth. It feels like being wrapped in angel wings.

name: Barioth Hardclaw
description: A strong, hard claw found on select Barioth. It can slice through hard shells like butter.

name: Barioth Greatspike
description: An extremely thick spike found on Barioth wings. It allows for overwhelming mobility.

name: Barioth Lash
description: A top-quality Barioth tail. Covered in hard plate, it requires considerable skill to remove.

name: Amber Hardfang
description: A thick, heavy tusk found on some Barioth. Strong enough to pierce almost anything.

name: Barroth Cortex
description: A Barroth cortex. Years' worth of mud have hardened it beyond all measure.

name: Barroth Chine
description: The thickest part of a Barroth's backplate. Mud, sun, and age have made it rock-hard.

name: Barroth Hardclaw
description: A strong claw found on only the most formidable of Barroth. It can easily dig through solid rock.

name: Barroth Crown
description: The heavy scalp of a form- idable Barroth. As durable as it is hard to remove.

name: Barroth Lash
description: A rigid tail carved from select Barroth. Inexpensive, but surprisingly versatile.

name: Spongy Piel
description: Nearly flawless elastic hide that retains water better than any comparable item.

name: Royal Ludroth Shard
description: The ultimate Royal Ludroth scale. A rainbow of colors shimmer on its surface.

name: Royal Ludroth Talon
description: A menacingly powerful Royal Ludroth claw that enables it to charge across any terrain.

name: Chic Crest
description: A proud, strong crest befitting a pack leader. Its sharp horns shine magnificently.

name: Royal Ludroth Lash
description: A superior tail from a Royal Ludroth. Its strength shows it was honed in harsh conditions.

name: Great Baggi Thickhide
description: High-quality Great Baggi hide. Can only be harvested from the strongest Baggi.

name: Glorious Crest
description: Crest of a particularly powerful Baggi, symbolizing the leader of a fierce pack.

name: Zinogre Electrofur+
description: Zinogre fur said to store an endless amount of electricity. Shines with intense light.

name: Zinogre Cortex
description: The teal cortex of a Zinogre. The monarch's armor crushes wills with its immense power.

name: Zinogre Hardclaw
description: A claw brandished by a Zinogre, untouchable in its supercharged state.

name: Zinogre Hardhorn
description: A mighty Zinogre horn. None can withstand its awesome, sky-shattering power.

name: Zinogre Lash
description: A superior Zinogre tail that wields incomparable destructive power.

name: Zinogre Deathly Shocker
description: A shell with electric power stronger than lightning. Has an immense effect on gear.

name: Zinogre Skymerald
description: An extremely rare gem found only in some Zinogre. Proof of the overwhelming warrior.

name: Great Wroggi Thickhide
description: High quality Wroggi hide. Can only be harvested from the strongest Wroggi.

name: Imperial Beak
description: The beak of a particularly powerful Wroggi, signifying a ferocious pack leader.

name: Arzuros Fur
description: Exceptional Arzuros fur. Soft and tough, it's perfect for hunters to wrap up in.

name: Arzuros Cortex
description: A superior Arzuros cortex. This highly-developed shell is a huge thorn in all hunters' sides.

name: Arzuros Allbrace
description: A supreme brace found only on certain Arzuros. Its tough, thornlike protrusions silence foes.

name: Lagombi Fur
description: The very finest Lagombi fur, durable and yet surprisingly soft. A top-shelf item.

name: Lagombi Auricle
description: Part of a Lagombi's sensitive ears. It can also be used as a fine material for crafting.

name: Lagombi Cuirass
description: Tougher and thicker than Lagombi Plastrons, it glints from many ice-polishings.

name: Lagombi Frigidclaw
description: Fearsomely sharp and tough, even among Lagombi claws. It will tear and freeze prey.

name: Volvidon Cortex
description: A heavy Volvidon cortex. Difficult to forge with, but can produce very powerful gear.

name: Volvidon Talon
