description: A punishing Volvidon claw. Its solidity and sharpness is almost overwhelming.

name: Large Volvi Rickrack
description: A larger kind of Volvidon shell, it's incredibly flexible, yet durable.

name: Gore Magala Shard
description: A quality scale whose jet black, lusterless surface bewitches unwary beholders.

name: Gore Magala Cortex
description: A heavy, dark carapace which offers solid equipment, but no guarantees of sanity.

name: Gore Magala Shredder
description: A grotesque claw that sows madness. Some smithies shun it, fearing infection.

name: Gore Magala Eclipse
description: Calamitous wings that go unseen in the night, sowing disease and reaping death.

name: Gore Magala Sensor
description: A large horn that pulses purple—an ill omen that made this a forbidden spoil.

name: Gore Magala Mantle
description: A nigh-impossible to find scale. Equipment made with it yields superhuman power.

name: S. Magala Shard
description: An especially thick, white scale. Fully matured, it boasts wall-like resistance.

name: S. Magala Cortex
description: Impenetrable armor. It is said humankind possesses no means of breaching it.

name: S. Magala Purifier
description: A Shagaru Magala claw in its hardest form. Proof of the beast's death and rebirth.

name: S. Magala Lightwing
description: A divine wing that guides the living toward both prosperity and ruin.

name: S. Magala Lash
description: A strong tail with inverted scales. Its pure white color is proof of fine quality.

name: S. Magala Hardhorn
description: A Shagaru Magala horn. They can withstand the test of time and will never decay.

name: S. Magala Mantle
description: A white scale believed lost. It can be used to create gear with superhuman power.

name: Seregios Slavescale+
description: A sharp scale that stands on end as its master angers and rips prey to awful pieces.

name: Seregios Airblade+
description: One of a seemingly limitless supply of wild blades shot at any who dare approach.

name: Seregios Carver+
description: Hooked talons that strike like lightning, sharp enough to rend the very air.

name: Seregios Scraper+
description: A sharp wing talon. This fine specimen is as good a material as a hindleg claw.

name: Seregios Impaler+
description: A spear-like tail so hard and sharp, it passes through prey as if they were air.

name: Seregios Breacher+
description: A sharp, robust horn with ripples as lovely as those in the most famed blades.

name: Seregios Lens
description: A rare pearl formed inside the body. Said to reveal invisible truths.

name: Astalos Shard
description: A high quality scale carved from an Astalos. Looks tough, but is actually quite flexible.

name: Heavy Astalos Shell
description: The spiny shell of an Astalos that covers it like armor. Try to keep a safe distance!

name: Astalos Wingmembrane
description: High quality wing membrane. Pulses green and continues to conduct electricity.

name: Boltscale
description: Astalos scale that bristles with electricity, even after its separated from its body.

name: Astalos Scissortailblade
description: The scissor-shaped tail of an Astalos. Watch out for its dangerously high voltage.

name: Heavy Astalos Crest+
description: A highly-conductive material taken from an Astalos's head. Pulses with electricity.

name: Astalos Wingripper
description: A sharp Astalos wingtalon, capable of cutting through its prey with just a touch.

name: Astalos Mantle
description: A legendary Astalos scale. Those who craft it rule the earth and seize the sky.

name: Mizutsune Shard
description: A top-quality Mizutsune scale. Its glossy appearance belies a surprising toughness.

name: Mizutsune Purplefell
description: Luxuriant purple fur that's quite tough, and works amazingly with bubblefoam.

name: Mizutsune Hardclaw
description: Mizutsune claw of unequaled hardness, able to pierce any enemy.

name: Mizutsune Silkfin
description: A fin so beautiful it would fit perfectly as a sacred raiment in a ritual dance.

name: Purple Mizutsune Tail
description: The lush fur and gorgeous scales on the Mizutsune's tail make for excellent dance accessories.

name: Distilled Bubblefoam
description: The top layer of Mizutsune fluid strained and distilled to the highest purity.

name: Mizutsune Mantle
description: A legendary Mizutsune scale. Those who can craft it rule the earth and seize the sky.

name: Shimmering Shard
description: A red-hot shard depicting a dragon spirit symbolizing the coming of calamity.

name: Glittering Shell
description: A red-hot shell. Its light alone is enough to render the sky asunder.

name: Valstrax Talon
description: A fearsome Valstrax talon able to unleash disaster. Just looking at it sends chills down the spine.

name: Valstrax Helixtail
description: A sharp section of Valstrax tail. Its eerie glow emits an unsettling aura.

name: Rouge Lancewing+
description: Rare wing tip of a Valstrax. It is capable of piercing its prey at supersonic speed.

name: Valstrax Spineshell+
description: A very rare piece of spine- protecting Valstrax shell that gleams like a mirror.

name: Red Dragonsphire
description: The source of heavenly calamities. Fly swiftly, as a comet 'cross the skies.

name: Seething Crimson Liquid
description: Liquid harvested from a Valstrax. The power of the intense heat it gives off is equal to that of a calamity.

name: Magnamalo Shard
description: A particularly thick and flexible scale that can withstand any assault.

name: Magnamalo Cortex
description: A rugged cortex hardened over time due to the sheer amount of resentment within.

name: Magna Ascended Blade
description: A blade that has slain many. Its many notches exhibit its fierce history.

name: Magnamalo Bladeshell
description: The hard shell of a blade which exudes anger and overflows with intense malice.

name: Magnamalo Hellhorn
description: The horn of a Magnamalo which has sustained itself on flesh and blood.

name: Magnamalo Speartail
description: A Magnamalo tail. Turns into a cross-shaped spear in search of prey when angered.

name: Magnamalo Soulprism+
description: Crystallized over many lifetimes, its docile purple flame emits a powerful aura.

name: Magnamalo Orb
description: A rare gem found in the body of Magnamalo. It emits a foreboding glow.

name: Begrudged Rancorscale
description: The countless scars on this scale reflects the anger and resentment they carry.

name: Magna Armored Cortex
description: The armor-like cortex of Scorned Magnamalo. With each battle the evil within it grows.

name: Surging Armblade
description: A massive arm blade capable of cutting through anything with its razor-sharp edge.

name: Moaning Bladeshell
description: An armor-like blade shell that emits a moaning sound when releasing gas.

name: Horn of Malice
description: Coming in contact with this horn exposes the owner to Magnamalo's malice.

name: Magnamalo Tail+
description: The seven blades of the tail still hold the hatred of those it has torn asunder.

name: Magna Barrierprism
description: The explosive gas from this crystal is enough to change the terrain it occupies.

name: Magna Glare Eye
description: This Magnamalo eye keeps a keen bead on sworn foes, as if malice still dwells within.

name: Bishaten Finefur
description: The finest Bishaten fur. It gives off the faint scent of persimmon.

name: Bishaten Hardclaw
description: Bishaten talons are sent to a shrine once a year as offerings for safety in the mountains.

name: Bishaten Glidefeather
description: One of the feathers Bishaten uses to ride the wind and further accelerate its movements.

name: Bishaten Heavyhorn
description: The horn of a Bishaten. The longer the horn, the higher the rank the beast holds.

name: Bishaten Hardtail
description: A tailcase so strong it can reduce a large tree to splinters with a simple swing.

name: Orangaten Fur+
description: Quality fur of a Blood Orange Bishaten. Its density allows it to withstand extreme heat.

name: Orangaten Talon
description: A Blood Orange Bishaten talon can ward off fire, as it can even withstand the hellstorms.

name: Orangaten Feather+
description: Blood Orange Bishaten feathers are used to fan flames, making objects red hot.

name: Orangaten Horn+
description: A Blood Orange Bishaten horn can read the slightest movement of the wind and manipulate fire.

name: Orangaten Tailcase+
description: A Blood Orange Bishaten's thick, hard tail armor. It overwhelms enemies with a sweeping blow.

name: Aknosom Shard
description: Aknosom's pure-white scales are so valuable, even the affluent can't afford them.

name: Aknosom Head-Crest
description: The way the head-crest sways gracefully like a flower is beautiful and terrifying.

name: Aknosom Plume
description: Aknosom's ultimate plumage. Light and flexible, it helps allow for all that dancing.

name: Aknosom Burnbeak
description: Aknosom's crimson beak. The terrifying color comes from exactly where you think.

name: Tetranadon Thickhide
description: Elastic hide that will never rupture, even if swallowed whole by another beast.

name: Heavy Tetra Carapace
description: The unparalleled defense of this back shell prevents all attacks from behind.

name: Tetranadon Finedisc
description: A beautiful dish-shaped bone from a Tetranadon head. Extremely valuable.

name: Tetranadon Greatbeak
description: The highest quality beak, both water-resistant and able to rend the earth.

name: Somnacanth Shard
description: When exposed to light, these scales mirror the surface of a placid lake bathed in moonlight.

name: Somnacanth Cortex
description: A Somnacanth's protective outer shell. Its streamlined shape allows for easy aquatic traversal.

name: Somnacanth Dreamtalon
description: Those lured by Somnacanth see these claws as they're dragged beneath the waves.

name: Somnacanth Wild Fin
description: The density of this Somnacanth fin fluctuates in accordance with its emotions.

name: Somna Dream Powder
description: Those who dare ingest this powder will be lost forever to the depths of the ocean.

name: Auroracanth Icescale
description: An Aurora Somnacanth scale. It's covered with cold air, producing a dusting of snow when windy.

name: Auroracanth Icecortex
description: A transmutation of the Aurora Somnacanth outer shell. It's much harder, and frozen to the core.

name: Auroracanth Iceclaw
description: Aurora Somnacanth's claws are covered with fine, sharp ice to extract frozen prey.

name: Auroracanth Fin
description: The head fin from an Aurora Somnacanth. Rimmed with frost to form a concealing veil.

name: Rakna-Kadaki Silk+
description: Items made from Rakna-Kadaki silk are so beautiful that they evoke eternal glory.

name: Rakna-Kadaki Cortex
description: Its hardness is what you would expect from a queen. It is impervious to attacks.

name: Rakna-Kadaki Hardclaw
description: An extremely hard claw from the spider queen. It targets weak points with a powerful blow.

name: Rakna-Kadaki Spike+
description: One after another, those enchanted by the beauty of this spike never return.

name: Rakna-Kadaki Glowgut+
description: A glowing luminous organ. Functions to repel enemies who target her babies.

name: Pyre-Kadaki Silk+
description: The maroon thread of the Pyre Rakna-Kadaki. Stronger than it appears, it can entangle prey.

name: Pyre-Kadaki Cortex
description: The white shell of the Pyre Rakna-Kadaki is made of layers, making it difficult to penetrate.

name: Pyre-Kadaki Hardclaw
description: A claw from Pyre Rakna-Kadaki. Despite its massive size, it is wielded with great precision.

name: Pyre-Kadaki Spike+
description: The Pyre Rakna-Kadaki spike is a sight to behold. Its tip shines, resembling a flame.

name: Pyre-Kadaki Dull Glowgut
description: The light of this glowgut reflects the Pyre Rakna-Kadaki's rage. It burns to the touch.

name: Almudron Cortex
description: Mighty guard of an Almudron. Inhaling the vapor from this cortex has a calming effect.

name: Almudron Shard
description: It's said for the scales to attain their dull glow, one must cast aside all desires.

name: Almudron Hardclaw
description: A heavy claw from an Almudron. Crushes anyone and anything that stands in its way.

name: Large Almudron Fin
description: An Almudron's powerful fin. Allows its user to freely form and shape mud.

name: Almud Ascetic Whisker
description: Almudron's whiskers grow longer with age, and are considered a lucky charm.

name: Almudron Lashtail
description: The thick, fleshy tail of an Almudron. Cooked properly, it has a rich flavor.

name: Pure Golden Sludge
description: Mud of particular danger and value. Once commanded by an Almudron.

name: Almudron Mantle
description: A mantle of legend. Not even mud can stop its brilliance from shining through.

name: Magmadron Shard
description: A Magma Almudron scale soaked in mud lava, making it flexible enough to absorb strong impacts.

name: Magmadron Cortex
description: Magma Almudron shell is strong and dense enough to withstand heat and pressure when in lava.

name: Magmadron Hardclaw
description: A Magma Almudron's claws become sharpened on gravel and debris as they swim through the earth.

name: Large Magmadron Fin
description: A thick bundle of hair. The mucus glands within trap debris and melt it to form mud lava.

name: Magmadron Hardwhisker
description: Magma Almudron whiskers have glands of mucus that can melt rock, so handle carefully.

name: Magmadron Tail
description: Rigid and durable, the Magma Almudron's tail can manipulate a large amount of mud lava.

name: Inferno Lava Mud
description: Mud lava produced by the Magma Almudron becomes very tough by melting minerals in the earth.

name: Magmadron Mantle
description: Magma Almudron scales appear in ancient texts. They're the same temperature as boiling lava.

name: Ibushi Finehide
description: Exceptionally high quality hide, capable of repelling any and all attacks.

name: Ibushi Cortex
description: Armor of the gods, forged in the heart of a storm, this cortex neutralizes all attacks.

name: Ibushi Hardhorn
description: When polished, this horn shows a raging storm trapped within an azure blade.

name: Ibushi Hardclaw
description: A claw sharp enough to rend the heavens and powerful enough to destroy a country.

name: Ibushi Bluespike+
description: A sharp spike from Wind Serpent Ibushi. It boasts beautiful patterns carved by the wind.

name: Ibushi Windsac+
description: An organ that produces and stores wind energy, then expels it in a mighty push.

name: Wind Dragonsphire
description: The source of the Wind God's power. Contains the power to harness a raging storm.

name: Goss Harag Frozen Fur
description: Only a few Goss Harag are able to produce this high-quality fur. It's both supple and tough.

name: Goss Finehide
description: The pitted and scarred hide of a powerful Goss Harag. Offers almighty defense.

name: Goss Harag Hardclaw
description: The ferocious claw of a Goss Harag. Able to instantly shred anything caught in its path.

name: Goss Harag Allbrace
description: Covered in clumps of ice; it's gained incredible strength through conflict.

name: Goss Harag Hardhorn
description: Horn of an ancient Goss Harag that's proven its worth amongst its own kind.

name: Dense Block of Ice
description: A heavy ice block found on the front limbs of a Goss Harag. They're especially dense.

name: Goss Harag Bile+
description: A massive gall bladder found inside a Goss Harag. It's said to grant immortality.

name: Great Izuchi Thickfur
description: Smooth Great Izuchi fur. Often used as a material in the production of clothing.

name: Great Izuchi Thickhide
description: Thick Great Izuchi hide. Popular because it doesn't deteriorate when forged.

name: Great Izuchi Grindtail
description: Few Great Izuchi have this tail. Can cut through prey in one fell swoop.

name: Narwa Thickhide
description: Very thick hide that emits electric shocks. Protects from thunder attacks.

name: Narwa Lighting Sac
description: An organ that holds immense thunder energy. A symbol of Thunder Serpent Narwa.

name: Narwa Hardclaw
description: A claw powerful enough to alter surrounding terrain in the blink of an eye.

name: Narwa Tentacle+
description: A Narwa tentacle capable of launching a vicious assault against any would-be attackers.

name: Scale of Origin+
description: A scale from the serpent's body. Do not resist its advent, lest you be returned to dust.

name: Horn of Origin+
description: A horn discarded by the dragon of wind and thunder. Protects against misfortune.

name: Mantle of Origin
description: A legendary dragon treasure. Those who wield it rule the earth and seize the sky.

name: Anjanath Shard
description: A thick Anjanath scale. Forged in the heat of battle, it's stronger than metal.

name: Anjanath Fur
description: Anjanath fur. The hair is thick and densely packed, making it very durable.

name: Anjanath Hardfang
description: Larger, more mature version of an Anjanath hardfang. Incredibly heat resistant.

name: Heavy Anjanath Nosebone
description: The nosebone of a mighty Anjanath. Its size indicates the strength of the beast.

name: Anjanath Lash
description: The mighty tail of an Anjanath. One blow deals unequalled destructive power.

name: Anjanath Mantle
description: A legendary Anjanath mantle. Those who can craft it rule the earth and seize the sky.

name: Pukei-Pukei Shard
description: Bright green scales that blend perfectly in a forest to disorient invaders.

name: Pukei-Pukei Cortex
description: A very durable Pukei-Pukei cortex. Its light weight is easy to forge with.

name: Pukei-Pukei Fellwing
description: A Pukei-Pukei fellwing. Covered in an extremely rigid and elastic membrane.

name: Large Pukei-Pukei Sac
description: Due to the poison inside, this large sac requires extreme care when handling.

name: Pukei-Pukei Lash
description: A colorful Pukei-Pukei lash. The colors mesmerize all who gaze upon its beauty.

name: Kulu-Ya-Ku Shard
description: A thick Kulu-Ya-Ku scale. A milky white color, it's a lot stronger than it first appears.

name: Kulu-Ya-Ku Thickhide
description: The thick hide of Kulu-Ya-Ku is used for clothing and also for armor, since it's so durable.

name: Colossal Drill Beak
description: A fine quality Kulu-Ya-Ku beak. Its strength allows it to crack open both eggs and shells.

name: Large Kulu-Ya-Ku Plume
description: A huge Kulu-Ya-Ku plume. It's quite alluring, thanks to the vivid, flashy colors.

name: Jyuratodus Shard
description: A thick Jyuratodus scale. Layers of mud on the surface only bolster its strength.

name: Jyuratodus Cortex
description: A well-polished Jyuratodus Cortex. Can only be pierced by an extraordinary attack.

name: Jyuratodus Hardfang
description: A large fang of a Jyuratodus. No prey can escape once pierced by its muddied point.

name: Jyuratodus Grandfin
description: A powerful Jyuratodus fin that allows for easy traversal through mud. Extremely rigid, yet versatile.

name: Tobi-Kadachi Shard
description: Despite the thickness and rigidness of this scale, it's actually quite flexible.

name: Tobi-Kadachi Thickfur
description: Thick layers of Tobi-Kadachi fur can store large amounts of electricity.

name: Tobi-Kadachi Membrane+
description: Thick membrane from the leg of a Tobi-Kadachi. Increases mobility when gliding.

name: Tobi-Kadachi Hardclaw
description: A mighty claw that Tobi-Kadachi wield with tremendous power and speed.

name: Tobi-Kadachi Cathode
description: More developed than its electrode, and capable of setting the world ablaze.

name: Bazelgeuse Cortex
description: Outer shell with excellent resistance to protect the Bazelgeuse from bomb blasts.

name: Bazelgeuse Glandflux
description: Formed by the accumulation of fuses inside its body. Secretes explosive liquid.

name: Bazelgeuse Fellwing
description: The more battle scars this fellwing possesses, the more valuable it becomes.

name: Bazelgeuse Shard
description: A thick Bazelgeuse scale that enthralls those who behold its mysterious silver radiance.

name: Bazelgeuse Hardclaw
description: Massive Bazelgeuse talon. Terrifying knowing how many have been laid to rest by its destructive power.

name: Bazelgeuse Flail
description: The Bazelgeuse's heavy tail is covered in explosive scales, making it a moving powder keg.

name: Bazelgeuse Mantle
description: Explosions and high temperatures cannot dull the silver radiance of this rare material.

name: Malzeno Cortex
description: A heavy shell that fully covers Malzeno. Its silvery gleam brings beholders to their knees.

name: Malzeno Fellwing
description: One of Malzeno's elegant silver wings. It regains its scarlet glow after absorbing blood.

name: Malzeno Hardfang
description: Malzeno's deadly fangs can crush shell and bone to absorb the life blood of its prey.

name: Malzeno Tail
description: Malzeno's tail. Tough enough to shatter any fortification, yet sharp enough to pierce iron.

name: Bloody Parasite
description: A Qurio that has long fed on Malzeno blood. Its body emits a permanent red glow.

name: Malzeno Bloodstone
description: A rare gem found in the body of Malzeno. Its brilliance ema- nates the coldness of death.

name: Lunagaron Cortex
description: This Lunagaron shell is covered with layers of ice, making it strong enough for any battle.

name: Lunagaron Shard
description: The scars on this Lunagaron scale are signs of strength, power, and perseverance.

name: Lunagaron Frost Jewel
description: A mysterious rare gem from a Lunagaron. Just looking at it will chill your spine.

name: Frostborn Hardfang
description: A horrifying Lunagaron hard- fang. Those that look upon it tremble with fear.

name: Lunagaron Bluecore
description: This glowing blue core generates intense cold air and is the source of the Lunagaron's power.

name: Luna Vermilion Hardclaw
description: A vermilion-colored Lunagaron claw. Its color grows darker with each victim it cuts down.

name: Lunagaron Lash Shell
description: Tough shell that covers the Lunagaron's thick tail. Able to cut through anything it slashes.

name: Garangolm Hardfang
description: Dense and extremely stiff, this quality fang can only be processed by true experts.

name: Garangolm Cortex
description: A sturdy, yet creepy shell with lots of crooked parts. No two shells are alike.

name: Golm Thick Juice
description: Bodily fluids that epitomize the Garangolm, causing quick- growing moss and explosions.

name: Golm Ploughtail
description: A Garangolm's heavy tail. It can gouge and cultivate the soil, promoting new growth.

name: Archdemon Doomhorn
description: A horn from the Archdemon of the Abyss, alight with rage and turning all to ash.

name: Archdemon Tailhook
description: The Archdemon of the Abyss's tail, its five spikes like a giant fist to crush all hope.

name: Archdemon Backshell
description: The Archdemon of the Abyss's shell, jagged like the teeth of the gatekeeper of hell.

name: Abyssal Dragonscale
description: A scale from the Archdemon of the Abyss, with a sheen so deep, even hope is lost within.

name: Archdemon Wingtalon
description: A wingclaw from the Archdemon of the Abyss, with no hint of the divine heights it once knew.

name: Archdemon Piercetalon
description: A claw from the Archdemon of the Abyss. Capable of inflicting untold and never-ending pain.

name: Abyssal Dragonsphire
description: A gem from the Archdemon of the Abyss. Engulfs light and drags souls into eternal darkness.

name: Espinas Shard
description: A deep green scale. Its color allows Espinas to blend into their surroundings.

name: Espinas Cortex
description: The cortex of an Espinas. Its durability alone is enough to deter attackers.

name: Espinas Surspike
description: One of the many red spikes found on Espinas. The tip oozes a deadly poison.

name: Espinas Lash
description: The spiked tail of an Espinas. Wielding it can swiftly send enemies to their doom.

name: Espinas Toxic Blood
description: Blood enriched with Espinas poison. Just one drop can be fatal to all animals in the surrounding area.

name: Hornetaur Razorwing
description: A sharp Hornetaur wing. Once drawn, it's capable of splitting almost anything in two.

name: Hornetaur Cortex
description: What little carapace can be harvested from a single bug is incredibly durable.

name: Hornetaur Head
description: Horned skull of a Hornetaur. Highly valuable due to its limited quantity.

name: Vespoid Razorwing
description: A razor-sharp Vespoid wing. Just as deadly as the stinger on its abdomen.

name: Vespoid Cortex
description: This carapace is lightweight and durable, making it an excellent material.

name: Velociprey Shard
description: A thick, clear blue shard which is highly valued as a work of art.

name: Velociprey Thickhide
description: When skinned and tanned carefully, this hide can be crafted into lovely objects.

name: Bullfango Thickfur
description: A top-quality pelt from a Bullfango. The fur is quite dense and bristly.

name: Anteka Proud Antler
description: A hefty antler that's valued by seasoned hunters and collectors alike.

name: Remobra Finehide
description: The highest quality in Remobra skins. It shines with a luster reminiscent of a black pearl.

name: Striped Finehide
description: Classy Remobra stripes on a resilient hide—a winner in any hunter's book.

name: Mighty Remobra Head
description: The snake-like head of a Remobra. Its presence may induce a mild panic.

name: Tiny Hermitaur Shell
description: A bone fragment from a giant Carapaceon. Small, but its value depends on its use.

name: Ceanataur Shell
description: This shell lets Ceanataurs live in harsh environments. Light, yet sharp enough to cut rock.

name: Bnahabra Razorwing
description: A wing that slices like a well-honed knife. Difficult to use in forging.

name: Prized Stomach
description: The finest Altaroth stomach. Often overlooked because it's thin and transparent.

name: Gajau Thickhide
description: Thick Gajau hide. Quite versatile because it's so elastic and water resistant.

name: Steel Gajau Whisker
description: A thick Gajau whisker. Once braided, they become a highly durable material.

name: Jaggi Shard
description: A Jaggi scale favored by hunters, as it can be easily worked into tough gear.

name: Jaggi Piel
description: Very thick Jaggi hide. A distinctively smooth, easy to work with material.

name: Hydro Piel
description: Thick, durable hide of an aquatic monster that's highly water-resistant.

name: Gargwa Finefeather
description: A feather plucked from a Gargwa. Stylish, and can be used to reinforce armor.

name: Jagras Shard
description: A shard from a Jagras. The thicker it is, the more brilliantly it shines.

name: Kestodon Husk
description: This thick, heavy husk makes the Kestodon impervious to most attacks.

name: Bombadgy Activator
description: A highly flammable liquid. If processed correctly, it can be used for tanning.

name: Heavy Izuchi Pelt
description: A fine quality Izuchi pelt. Its bright orange hue gives the impression it's glowing.

name: Rachnoid Mesmersilk
description: The strongest thread a Rachnoid can produce. Holds many times its own weight.

name: Pyrantula Maroon Thread
description: Thread soaked in explosive Pyrantula body fluid. Hard to handle, but very durable.

name: Boggi Thickhide
description: A patchy Boggi hide, vaunted by travelers for dry weather and fluctuating temperatures.

name: Boggi Shard
description: Tiny Brown Boggi scales that, when layered, absorb impact much like chain mail.

name: Monster Toughbone
description: Arguably the strongest type of bone, with an incredible strength and presence.

name: Large Elder Dragon Bone
description: Top-grade bone from a large wyvern. Its rough, majestic shape tells a vivid tale.

name: Massive Bone
description: An impossibly hard bone from a large beast. Exceeds all crafting material standards.

name: Monster Slogbone
description: An incredibly strong bone from a fearsome wyvern. Its heft is impressive.

name: Solid Bone
description: Bones so solid they'd never decay, and so tough, no ordinary attack could even scratch them.

name: Prized Pelt
description: A quality pelt from a small animal. Often used in clothing for its comfort.

name: Tough Claw
description: A tough claw typical of small monsters. Its sharp edge makes it an excellent weapon.

name: Crushing Fang
description: Fangs come in many shapes and sizes—the right fang for the right job.

name: Pawprint Ticket
description: A Lynian ticket decorated with bright pawprint stamps. Was a "thank you" gift.

name: Supple Piel
description: A flexible, elastic hide from a Leviathan. A useful material that requires effort to obtain.

name: Deadly Poison Sac
description: A monster organ filled with an extremely virulent toxin. Handle with extreme care.

name: Monster Essence
description: A broth made from only the thickest, choicest monster juices. Gross?

name: Ultraplegia Sac
description: A monster organ filled with concentrated neurotoxins. Handle with extreme care.

name: Torpor Sac
description: A monster organ with a sleep effect powerful enough to down even raging beasts in seconds.

name: Lightning Sac
description: A monster organ that stores electricity and lightning. It rumbles like thunder.

name: Conflagrant Sac
description: A monster organ filled with a highly explosive powder. Extremely dangerous!

name: Cryo Sac
description: A monster organ filled with a potent freezing agent. Can ice a broad area instantly.

name: Fey Wyvern Gem
description: An exceptionally pure gem from a bird wyvern. Fragile and difficult to carve.

name: Flood Sac
description: A monster organ designed to hold and preserve tremendous amounts of water.

name: Pure Dragon Blood
description: Elder dragon blood that contains a potent mix of its mysterious ingredient.

name: Malzeno Shard
description: Thick scales that cover Malzeno. Strong and lustrous, their surface is unsoiled.

name: Malzeno Hardhorn
description: A cruel spirit dwells within this solid, elegant Malzeno horn. Pulses softly at night.

name: Large Wyvern Gem
description: A wyvern gem that has grown over the ages. Emits a mesmerizing shimmer.

name: Large Elder Dragon Gem
description: A giant, ultra-rare stone that forms inside an Elder Dragon once in a millennium.

name: Espinas Hardhorn
description: The Espinas is known for its red horn, which exudes death and conceals a ferocious nature.

name: Gore Magala Tail
description: A black tail covered in sharp inverted scales that shred prey at a stroke.

name: Espinas Mantle
description: The green of this mantle is said to be a blessing from mother nature herself.

name: Large Beast Gem
description: A rare and precious gem from a particular beast, produced in the body over a long period of time.

name: Purecrystal
description: A crystal of the highest durability and transparency. Can only be found in the Jungle.

name: Awegite
description: An ore of alluring brilliance. Its pattern shifts in response to the observer's mood.

name: Frocium
description: Precious metal from the Frost Islands. Gives off a blue sheen when the light catches it.

name: Uroktor Shard
description: A superior-quality Uroktor scale. Heat-resistant, bright crimson, and popular with the ladies.

name: Goldlite Ore
description: A glittering golden ore. Its sandstorm-polished surface is pleasing to the touch.

name: Allfire Stone
description: An ore that blazes with an all-consuming flame. Requires considerable skill to mine.

name: Meldspar Ore
description: An ore composed of a durable, flexible metal that works well as a combining agent.

name: Eltalite Ore
description: A promising new ore that produces higher quality metal than Carbalite Ore.

name: Ultimas Crystal
description: A crystal used to reinforce metal. It improves both durability and shock absorbency.

name: Sapphiron Ore
description: Ore often used to accentuate equipment, its coloring evoking images of verdant jungle.

name: Centuria Ore
description: Ore found in the Citadel. Made up of three colors, the ratio of which determines its use.

name: Massive Monster Bone
description: Hefty monster bone harvested from bonepiles. Special skill is required to work its thickness.

name: Giant Monster Bone
description: Gargantuan monster bone harvested from bonepiles, shaved down to its core for gear crafting.

name: Frozen Stiffbone
description: A thick bone well preserved by the Frost Islands' chill. Highly sought after by researchers.

name: Twisted Stiffbone
description: A heavy bone. Invokes the indescribable fear of the desolate Shrine Ruins.

name: Eroded Elder Skeleton
description: Elder dragon bone buried in the Sandy Plains. Unblemished despite years in the region.

name: Caked Stiffbone
description: A heavy bone with a faint earthy aroma. Thick where the Flooded Forest's mud sticks to it.

name: Blackened Stiffbone
description: A thick bone charred in the heat of the Lava Caverns. Makes for strong gear material.

name: Overgrown Stiffbone
description: A bone found in the Jungle covered in thick moss. The moss also contains bone fragments making it quite valuable.

name: Chipped Oldbone
description: A thick, chipped bone that can be found in the Citadel. Used to craft gear.

name: Dragonbone Artifact
description: Rare bone from an elder dragon that once ruled the land. A mysterious power lies within.

name: Felyne Great Fur Ruby
description: An orb of uncommon size. Sparkles with a luster inconceivable for a hairball.

name: Afflicted Pelt
description: A monster pelt altered by the Anomaly. The Qurio's influence is clear to see.

name: Afflicted Bone
description: A monster bone altered by the Anomaly. The Qurio's influence is clear to see.

name: Afflicted Monster Bone
description: A large monster bone altered by the Anomaly. The influence of influence is clear to see.

name: Afflicted Blood
description: Monster blood altered by the Anomaly. The Qurio's influence is clear to see.

name: Afflicted Scale
description: A monster scale altered by the Anomaly. The Qurio's influence is clear to see.

name: Afflicted Shell
description: A monster shell altered by the Anomaly. The Qurio's influence is clear to see.

name: Afflicted Fang
description: A monster fang altered by the Anomaly. The Qurio's influence is clear to see.

name: Rainbowshrooms
description: A set of colorful mushrooms most pleasing to the eye. Both their taste and toxicity are especially peculiar.

name: Jewel of the Fallen Star
description: A handful of Stargazer Flowers. They emit a faint light as if sent from the divine to bless mortals.

name: Afflicted Claw
description: A monster claw altered by the Anomaly. The Qurio's influence is clear to see.

name: Sinister Gloomcloth
description: A cloth worn by a messenger long ago in a faraway underworld. Can supposedly absorb life.

name: Maximumpkin
description: The king of Bumblepumpkins. It has grown to an unbelievable size as a result of being carefully nurtured.

name: Flouncejelly
description: The frilly folds and lace pattern on this jellyfish grant it the appearance of both an umbrella and a noble lady.

name: Nohsic Snuffcap
description: A mushroom eaten in the past for preventative purposes. Has an invigorating aroma.

name: Grooved Bones
description: Ancient bones that exhibit signs of having been worked using advanced techniques.

name: Deepshell
description: A half-fossilized Dreamshell found on the sea floor. It contains more gas than modern species.

name: Split-Jaw Buttlefly
description: An incredibly rare insect with the wings of a butterfly and a large jaw that splits in two at the end.

name: Large Toxic Kumori
description: The largest of the Kumori, it possesses a deadly poison banned in many countries.

name: Prairie Cricket
description: A cricket resembling a bouquet of flowers. It is often found amongst the flowers, emitting a chirping sound.

name: Large Armored Bream
description: An armored bream that has grown to full size. Its scales are as thick as its body, and very strong.

name: Sun Springnight Carp
description: A springnight carp that only comes out in sunny weather. Their scales are even more brilliant in the light.

name: Valiabiscus
description: A Dosbiscus whose ecology changed as it adapted to the climate. It has a strong, dizzying fragrance.

name: Locked Treasure Chest
description: A treasure chest pulled from the ocean. A heavy lock that's rusted shut makes it impossible to open.

name: Royal Order Certificate I
description: Bestowed by the Kingdom to those in recognition of their deeds. Used to craft knightly equipment.

name: Royal Order Certificate II
description: Bestowed by the Kingdom to those in further recognition of their deeds. Used to craft knightly equipment.

name: Royal Order Certificate III
description: Bestowed upon those whose deeds have spread throughout the Kingdom. Used to craft knightly equipment.

name: Adamant Jewel
description: An indispensable item used in decorations. A rare gem that houses immense power.

name: Haiku: In Song
description: Beautifully written haiku by an anonymous but skilled and kind-hearted soul.

name: Sovereign Jewel
description: An indispensable item used in decorations. Rare and brimming with fierce power.

name: F Ninja Belt
description: A white belt associated with back-to-back winners of the Felyne Martial Arts Festival.

name: King Armor Sphere
description: A brightly glowing Armor Sphere. Use this scarce commodity to take your armor to new heights.

name: Tea Shop Cloth
description: A wrapping cloth with the village Tea Shop's emblem and an air of prestige.

name: Old Wrestler Print
description: A colored cloth with a print of a legendary hunter who once wrestled a Tetranadon.

name: Spa Scene: Sash
description: A young, brightly decorated Wyverian woman bathing in an eerie mountain stream.

name: Spa Scene: Hairpin
description: Queen of the babbling streams depicted sporting an exquisite hairpin.

name: Spa Scene: Clip
description: A sash fastener depicting a moonlit stream during a wild lightning storm.

name: Spa Scene: Kimono
description: An image of the demise of three, with the two behind appearing oddly wanton.

name: Ball of Soft Wool
description: A unique product of a spectacular mountain region. Spun from fluffy Moofah fur.

name: Sea Chart (Copy)
description: A chart essential for sea travel. At old destinations, nostalgic tears fall.

name: Prima Bherna Eggplant
description: A first-rate, choice eggplant that gives dishes new levels of deliciousness.

name: 4-Part Souvenir
description: A knife, robe, scarf, and haori souvenir set, with a focus on luxury.

name: Hermitaur Coin
description: A coin given to those who have bested a Daimyo Hermitaur in the Arena.

name: Bishaten Coin
description: A coin given to those who have bested a Blood Orange Bishaten in the Arena.

name: Garangolm Coin
description: A coin given to those who have bested a Garangolm in the Arena.

name: Lunagaron Coin
description: A coin given to those who have bested a Lunagaron in the Arena.

name: Espinas Coin
description: A coin given to those who have bested an Espinas in the Arena.

name: Furious Rajang Coin
description: A coin given to those who have bested a Furious Rajang in the Arena.

name: Rager Coin
description: A gleaming silver coin awarded to those who complete master rank Arena quests.

name: Hero King Coin
description: A gleaming golden coin awarded to those who complete master rank Arena quests.

name: Garangolm Fist
description: The fist of a Garangolm. Its massive size and weight can physically squash all foes.

name: Garangolm Shard
description: Mossy Garangolm scales. Sap-like juices and plants mix to make them super hard.

name: Consumption Parasite
description: Crazed Qurio that swarm all who attack their host. Sharp fangs puncture any material.

name: Elgado Ticket
description: A ticket given for contributions to the Outpost. Give it to the Smithy and...?

name: Platinum Egg
description: An egg of polished platinum. Incredibly valuable. Sells for a fortune.

name: Anomaly Ticket
description: A ticket given for slaying afflicted monsters. Give it to the Smithy and...?

name: Conqueror's Seal
description: A prize only for those who have overcome many trials. Proof of extreme valor.

name: Outfit Voucher+
description: A ticket needed to forge layered armor. For the fashion-conscious hunter.

name: Gowngoat Thickfur
description: Warm Gowngoat mohair makes any armor stab-proof when woven into the seams.

name: Basarios Lash
description: A sturdy Basarios tail incorporating quality mineral for exceptional strength.

name: Large Herbivore Bone
description: The thick, sturdy bone of a herbivore. Up there with the best of them.

name: Potion
description: Restores a small amount of health.

name: Mega Potion
description: Restores a moderate amount of health.

name: Max Potion
description: Fully restores health.

name: Ancient Potion
description: Fully restores your health and stamina.

name: Nulberry
description: Mysterious berry that cures blights and resistance down.

name: Antidote
description: A cure for poison/venom.

name: Herbal Medicine
description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

name: Cleanser
description: Immediately removes any foam or webbing on your body.

name: Deodorant
description: An item that cures Stench, hellfireblight, and blast- blight when thrown down.

name: Energy Drink
description: A Guild-approved beverage that boosts your stamina. Helps shake off sleep, too!

name: Ration
description: Food that restores a bit of stamina.

name: Rare Steak
description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina. This one's still red in the middle.

name: Well-done Steak
description: Food that fully restores stamina.

name: Burnt Meat
description: Meat that has been burnt to a crisp. It might boost your stamina, or drain it...

name: Dash Juice
description: Reduces stamina depletion for a period of time as well as restoring a bit of stamina.

name: Immunizer
description: Boosts your natural ability to heal.

name: Might Seed
description: Temporarily strengthens your attacks when ingested by improving energy flow.

name: Demondrug
description: Boosts your attack power by filling you with—guess what?—demonic strength.

name: Mega Demondrug
description: Boosts your attack power even more than a regular Demondrug.

name: Adamant Seed
description: Temporarily raises your defense when ingested by hardening tissue.

name: Armorskin
description: Boosts your defense by turning your skin as hard as rock.

name: Mega Armorskin
description: Boosts your defense even more than a regular armorskin.

name: Lifepowder
description: Produces a cloud that heals you and anyone nearby.

name: Dust of Life
description: Produces a cloud that restores a large amount of health for you and anyone nearby.

name: Herbal Powder
description: Produces a cloud that cures poison and heals you a bit.

name: Demon Powder
description: A mysterious powder; when dispersed, temporarily strengthens attacks.

name: Hardshell Powder
description: A mysterious powder; when dispersed, temporarily strengthens defense.

name: Flash Bomb
description: Flashes brightly on impact. Toss this right under a monster's nose to blind it.

name: Sonic Bomb
description: A hand-thrown bomb that emits a high-frequency blast of sound on detonation.

name: Dung Bomb
description: A particularly odorous ball that causes monsters to flee.

name: Tranq Bomb
description: A bomb used to capture monsters ensnared in traps. Can be used in various ways.

name: Poison Smoke Bomb
description: Releases a toxic cloud of mist when used. Also popular as a household bug bomb.

name: Farcaster
description: Instantly transports you to the nearest camp. Can also be used during battles.

name: BBQ Spit
description: Just what you need to cook meat. A must-have item for any hungry hunter.

name: Whetstone
description: A standard-sized whetstone. Use it to restore a weapon's sharpness.

name: Raw Meat
description: Meat carved from a monster. You might catch a certain Flooded Forest fish with it.

name: Poisoned Meat
description: Raw meat that poisons whatever eats it. Makes great bait for traps.

name: Throwing Kunai
description: A standard throwing kunai. Flies straight and true. Allows for precise aiming.

name: Tinged Meat
description: Raw meat that paralyzes whatever eats it. Makes great bait for traps.

name: Large Barrel Bomb
description: A powerful bomb triggered by external physical impact.

name: Drugged Meat
description: Raw meat that puts whatever eats it to sleep. Makes great bait for traps.

name: Barrel Bomb
description: A small time bomb.

name: Mega Barrel Bomb
description: An upgraded large barrel bomb. Effective against large monsters.

name: Shock Trap
description: A trap that immobilizes a target. Use it to capture monsters.

name: Sushifish
description: A fatty fish that can restore a small amount of health.

name: Pitfall Trap
description: A trap for catching certain large monsters. It is tripped by a heavy weight.

name: Gourmet Fish
description: Recovers the red portion of the Health Gauge and increases natural recovery.

name: Whetfish
description: A fish with a dorsal fin hard enough to be used to sharpen weapons.

name: Great Whetfish
description: A jumbo-sized Whetfish. Its dorsal fin surpasses even whetstones in functionality.

name: First-aid Med
description: Restores a small amount of health. (Supply Item)

name: First-aid Med+
description: Restores a moderate amount of health. (Supply Item)

name: EZ Meat Bait

name: EZ Demon Powder
description: Temporarily strengthens attacks for everyone nearby. (Supply Item)

name: EZ Large Barrel Bomb
description: A powered-up large barrel bomb. As powerful as a mega barrel bomb. (Supply Item)

name: EZ Pitfall Trap
description: Activates a pitfall to catch monsters with. (Supply Item)

name: EZ Shock Trap
description: Immobilizes a target for easy capture. (Supply Item)

description: A bomb that flashes brightly on impact. (Supply Item)

name: Poison Kunai
description: A throwing kunai with a venom-coated blade. Poisons targets. (Supply Item)

name: Paralysis Kunai
description: A throwing kunai coated with toxins that paralyze a target. (Supply Item)

name: Sleep Kunai
description: A throwing kunai that has been dusted with sleeping agents. (Supply Item)

name: Poisonfruit
description: Fruit that turns poisonous when it decomposes. Too dangerous to keep after a quest.

name: Parafruit

name: Flashfruit
description: Fruit that pops with a bright flash if shaken. Too dangerous to keep after a quest.

name: Ice Barrel Bomb
description: A freezing silver seed barrel bomb. Too dangerous to keep after a quest.

description: Capable of sending hunters soaring in a set direction.

name: Magnamalo Scute+
description: The blades produced from Magnamalo's back when enraged show its tenacity.

name: Tigrex Fang
description: A terrifying fang used to crush prey. Makes all who see it quiver in fear.

name: Normal Ammo 1
description: Ammo for novices. Doesn't pack much oomph. Unlimited shots.

name: Normal Ammo 2
description: Non-specialized ammo. More powerful than Normal Ammo 1.

name: Normal Ammo 3
description: High-quality gunpowder ammo. Single-shot, but fast and impactful.

name: Pierce Ammo 1
description: Armor-piercing ammo that deals multiple hits to some monsters.

name: Pierce Ammo 2
description: High-grade armor-piercing ammo. Deals more hits than Pierce Ammo 1.

name: Spread Ammo 2
description: Ammo made for close combat. Deals more hits than Spread Ammo 1.

name: Spread Ammo 1
description: Ammo made for close combat. What it lacks in range, it makes up for in damage.

name: Pierce Ammo 3
description: Max-grade armor-piercing ammo. Deals numerous hits.

name: Spread Ammo 3
description: Max-grade ammo made for close combat. Deals numerous hits.

name: Shrapnel Ammo 1
description: Ammo that covers a wide area. Who needs accuracy when you hit this much?

name: Shrapnel Ammo 2
description: Ammo that covers a wide area. More range and even more hits than Shrapnel Ammo 1.

name: Shrapnel Ammo 3
description: Max-grade shrapnel ammo that delivers maximum range and hit-count over a wide area.

name: Sticky Ammo 1
description: Powerful pierce and burst ammo. Headshots may stun.

name: Sticky Ammo 2
description: Very powerful pierce and burst ammo. Headshots may stun.

name: Sticky Ammo 3
description: Powerful pierce and burst ammo. Headshots stun.

description: The fairy tale Archdemon of the Abyss, which new records suggest actually existed.

name: Daimyo Hermitaur Statue
description: A reward for collecting Jungle notes. The rasp of its pincers rings out as it meanders across the beach.

name: Shogun Ceanataur Statue
description: A gift for the lucky hunter who won the Grand Prize. A scythe of bisecting terror.

name: Astalos Statue
description: A reward for collecting all Jungle notes. Emits green lighting, incinerating all enemies.

name: Lunagaron Statue
description: A reward for collecting all Citadel notes. Springs forth with claws drawn, unleashing an icy gale.

name: Garangolm Statue
description: A reward for collecting Citadel notes. A lurking beast of the forest that avoids unnecessary conflict.

name: Malzeno Statue
description: A gift for the lucky hunter who won the Grand Prize. Some say hunting is easier.

name: Archfiend Statue
description: A gift for the lucky hunter who won the Grand Prize. Despair rising from the deep.

name: Espinas Statue
description: A gift for the lucky hunter who won the Grand Prize. Let sleeping spikes lie.

name: Kingdom Longship
description: A longship model. Recreated meticulously under the eye of Kamura Village artisans.

name: Cohootrioshka
description: A wooden model of a Kamura Cohoot, a Snowy Elgado Cohoot, and a fledgling.

name: Toy Spelunker
description: A pull-back toy spelunker that's super popular as a souvenir for kids.

name: Regalfin Pouch
description: A pouch much beloved by Princess Chichae, with cute button eyes.

name: Gowngoat Bobbler
description: An ornament created using Kamura Village techniques for a smooth head movement.

name: Massive Copal
description: A massive copal created over many long years. Said to bring long life.

name: Gargolda Statue
description: A Gargolda model that looks ready to move at any moment with its piercing stare.
